lorebooks.creator: mrblackwood

1.content:
Northern Kingdoms
Also called the Northern Realms, the Northern Kingdoms comprise the territories located north of the Amell Mountains. These include:
Cintra, Aedirn, Lyria, Temeria, Redania, Cidaris, Hengfors League, Verden, Kaedwen, Kovir, Rivia, Poviss, Skellige.

Humans created the Northern Kingdoms after seizing control of land inhabited by the Elder Races. Certain strongholds, like Mahakam, are mostly inhabited by the Elder Races.

The Northern Kingdoms are at war with the Nilfgaardian Empire, which seeks to conquer the North. The Nilfgaardian Empire‚Äôs attack on Cintra ‚Äî which resulted in the death of Queen Calanthe (Ciri‚Äôs grandmother) ‚Äî started the First Northern War in 1263.

2.content:
The Nilfgaardian Empire is the most powerful kingdom on the Continent. Its territories are located south of the Amell Mountains.

Nilfgaard began as a mixed settlement of humans and elves. As the population grew, the city of Nilfgaard expanded into a kingdom, absorbing nearby territories. 

For centuries, Nilfgaard operated as a republic in which the kings were advised by a senate, which was later abolished.

Nilfgaard is ruled by Emperor Emhyr var Emreis. A cut-throat imperialist, Emhyr was the son of Fergus var Emreis, former Nilfgaardian king who was overthrown by a usurper in 1233.

3.content:
The Elder Races refer to the species that inhabited the Continent before the humans arrived during the Conjunction of the Spheres. These include:

gnomes, dwarves, halflings, elves. 
the Elder Races and humans are constantly at war with one another, as well as fighting amongst themselves. The opening chapter of Blood of Elves establishes that each species mostly keeps to itself, showing little tolerance toward others.

gnomes inhabited their world first, then dwarves, then halflings, then elves. 

Dwarves expresses some disdain toward elves, who he says ‚Äúhappen to be strangers just as much as humans, although they arrived in their white ships a good thousand years before you.‚Äù

4.content:
Witchers are monster slayers who have rudimentary magical powers. They travel the Continent killing monsters for coin.

Although more witcher schools exist in the games, three witcher schools exist in the books:

School of the Wolf (Geralt‚Äôs school, housed in Kaer Morhen)
School of the Cat
School of the Griffin

To become witchers, young boys must endure rigorous physical training and a dangerous witcher mutation process called the Trial of the Grasses. 

During the trials ‚Äî which took place in a now-unused laboratory deep within the Kaer Morhen vaults ‚Äî the boys were given magical elixirs, hormones, and herbs. 

The trials last roughly 7 days. If the boys survived, they‚Äôd emerge with cat-like witcher eyes, a longer lifespan, and sharp senses and reflexes.

The witcher trade is dying ‚Äî no one knows how to use the laboratory or brew the potions needed for the Trial of the Grasses anymore.

Aside from Geralt, four other witchers are mentioned in the books: Vesemir, Lambert, Eskel, and Co√´n. (Another witcher, Brehen, is mentioned in Season of Storms.) Letho, a witcher from the School of the Viper, also appears in Witcher 2 and 3 (but not the books).

5.content:
Vesemir is the oldest living witcher and sole survivor of the 12th-century massacre at Kaer Morhen. A fencing instructor, Vesemir maintains the keep and is a father figure to Geralt, Eskel, and Lambert.

When Geralt first finds Ciri in the Brokilon Forest, he tells her Vesemir used to tell him bedtime stories as a young witcher. Ciri affectionately calls him ‚ÄúUncle‚Äù Vesemir and Triss calls him ‚ÄúGrandfather‚Äù. Fans of the franchise call him ‚ÄúPapa‚Äù Vesemir.

6.content:
Eskel is presumed to be younger than Geralt, but the two witchers grew up together. He‚Äôs first mentioned in the short story ‚ÄúThe Last Wish‚Äù. 

As Geralt watches the djinn struggle to escape Yennefer‚Äôs trap, he recalls a memory in which he and Eskel trapped a bee with a thread tied to a jug. As the young witchers watched the bee struggle to get free, they ‚Äúwere in fits of laughter‚Äù ‚Äî until they were caught and disciplined by Vesemir.

In Blood of Elves, Eskel takes a firm approach in training Ciri but is well-mannered, unlike Lambert.

7.content:
Geralt of Rivia is the protagonist of the Witcher books, games, and Netflix show. Born to the sorceress Visenna, Geralt was surrendered to Kaer Morhen as an infant.

Although he‚Äôs arguably the most successful witcher on the Continent, Geralt endures prejudice from most people. He‚Äôs called a mutant, a freak, and other cruel names by the general public.

Geralt is in a tumultuous, on-and-off relationship with the sorceress Yennefer of Vengerberg. The couple is bound by destiny and a wish Geralt made to a djinn in The Last Wish.

His best friend is Dandelion, a flamboyant poet and bard who‚Äôs somewhat of a damsel in distress. Geralt features in many of Dandelion‚Äôs ballads, which are famous throughout the Continent.

keywords: The Lady of Space and Time
8.content:
Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon, or Ciri for short, is a Cintran princess destined for much greater things. After the death of her mother, Pavetta, Ciri became the sole heir to the Cintran crown.

Ciri is a child of the Elder Blood and possesses powerful magical abilities that let her travel between worlds and through time. In Blood of Elves and Time of Contempt, Yennefer teaches Ciri to harness and control her powers.

According to Ithlinne‚Äôs Prophecy, Ciri‚Äôs child will stop the White Frost and prevent the end of the world.

Throughout the books and games, Ciri is hunted by several people who want to control or abuse her powers for their own gain. These include Vilgefortz, Avallac‚Äôh, Emperor var Emreis, and the Lodge of Sorceresses.

As we already mentioned, Ciri is bound to Geralt by destiny. Geralt first met Ciri in the Brokilon Forest when she was around 10 years old. 

She‚Äôd lost her way in the forest after running away from Cintra to escape her arranged marriage with Prince Kistrin, future king of Verden. (But we don‚Äôt want to spoil their story for you ‚Äî go read The Sword of Destiny to learn more!)

9.content:
Yennefer of Vengerberg is a powerful sorceress, Geralt‚Äôs partner, and Ciri‚Äôs adoptive mother. Before she became a mage, Yennefer was a hunchback born to abusive parents. 

Her father called her a ‚Äúhunchback monster‚Äù and blamed Yennefer‚Äôs mother for the disability. Yennefer is part elf, descended from elven sorceresses on her mother‚Äôs side. In The Tower of the Swallow, she says she‚Äôs 94 years old.

One of her main goals throughout the books and TV show is to cure her infertility. (Most mages are sterile, although there are some exceptions, like Geralt‚Äôs mother.) To achieve this, she tries to capture a djinn in The Last Wish, which is how she ends up bound to Geralt.

Yennefer takes Ciri under her wing in Blood of Elves, testing her abilities and teaching her how to control her powers. Throughout the books, she does everything in her power to protect Ciri, even if it means sacrificing her own safety and freedom.

10.content:
Triss Merigold is a sorceress, healer, and member of the Lodge of Sorceresses. Also called ‚ÄúFourteenth of the Hill‚Äù, Triss was believed to have died during the Battle of Sodden during the First Northern War. Although she was seriously injured, she survived with the help of powerful healing magic.

Triss first appears in Blood of Elves. When Ciri begins having trances and predicting the future, Triss is summoned to Kaer Morhen to help. She spends the winter at Kaer Morhen, mentoring Ciri and teaching the witchers to cater to the unique needs of a growing girl.

Triss had a brief love affair with Geralt at some point after The Last Wish, while Geralt and Yennefer were quarreling. In the books, Triss admits she seduced Geralt using magic. Although Triss and Yennefer claim to be friends, there is jealousy on both sides. Yennefer even confronts Triss about it in Time of Contempt and The Lady of the Lake.

Triss is allergic to potions and uses amulets to heal herself. After their winter at Kaer Morhen, Triss and Geralt take Ciri to Ellander to study magic at Melitele‚Äôs temple. Along the way, Triss becomes very ill and realizes she lost her amulet. Geralt helps care for her on the road.

While she‚Äôs a relatively minor character in the books, she‚Äôs a major character in the games. Triss is also a romance option in Witcher 3 ‚Äî in the books, Geralt is in love with Yennefer and resists Triss‚Äô romantic advances.

1.content:
NOTE: FORMATTING.  Below is an example of how messages should be formatted using markdown for different types of content.
`Aqua Capital, Mac Anu`
*The sights and surroundings are beautiful and detailed. You see another player approaching.*
>randomdudeee15: hey!
*A message pops up on your screen.* randomdudeee15 has sent you a trade invite.
_________________________________________________________________________
Name
Lv.1 Twin Blade
HP: 63/63 | SP: 13/13 | EXP: 0 / 1000
Equip: Amateur Blades
Skill: Saber Dance, Repth, Vak Kruz
Item: Sprite Ocarina x1

DO NOT provide {{user}} with a list of roleplay options.

2.content: MAC ANU: Mac Anu is Delta Server's Root Town. It is a large city with numerous canals, boats and gondolas. Key landmarks are the Chaos Gate in the plaza, and the clocktower where event notices are posted. Mac Anu has an Item Shop, Weapon Shop and Magic Shop. Mac Anu is a newbie town and a popular gathering spot for players. The Crimson Knights use Mac Anu as their base.

3.content: CHAOS GATE DETAILS: Chaos Gates appear as a golden circular disc hovering in the air, spinning in circles, with a blue screen, as if to show into other worlds. When activated, the gate is encompassed by spinning golden bands, rapidly circling around it. Golden bands rapidly circle around the players downward, and the players are then teleported to their specified destination, appearing with golden bands spinning in circles around the player downwards.

4.content: DUNGEON DETAILS: The layout of the dungeon consists of an entrance, various random rooms, and a Gott statue on the lowest floor. In general, dungeons consist of at least two floors and at the most, five floors. The amount of floors on a dungeon depends on the field's parameters. The goal of a dungeon is to get to the lowest level and find the Gott Statue. In front of the statues are treasure chests holding rare items. There is a protective ring surrounding a levitating Gott Statue in the statue room. When a player opens the chest in front of it, the ring disappears, and the statue falls.

5.content: BLADEMASTER: Blademasters are a strong and versatile class that use one medium-sized one-handed blade in battle. Their relatively fast attack speed and area skills makes them a high tier physical class. Starting equip: Basic Sword

6.content: HEAVY AXEMAN: Heavy Axemen specialize in the use of axes, and are the physically strongest of all the classes. They have high physical attack and HP growth but have a slow walking speed and attack speed. Due to their overwhelming HP advantage as well as their decent physical and magical defenses, Heavy Axemen are the tanks of The World, best left right in front of a strong opponent and trading blows. They don't do so well against faster enemies and magic-casting enemies unless they get the first strike in. Starting equip: Hatchet

7.content: HEAVY BLADE: Heavy Blades are notable for their use of huge, double-handed swords and katanas. Heavy Blades have the ability to equip the heaviest, highest level armors. They generally have higher physical attack and accuracy but they sacrifice attack speed and defense growths in the process. Starting equip: Adventure Blade

8.content: LONG ARM: Long Arms are best known for their pole arm weapons and light movement. Long Arms have great attack and defense stats as well as superior range while sacrificing magical capabilities and multi-hit skills.  Starting equip: Bronze Spear

9.content: TWIN BLADE: Twin Blades are a versatile class specialising in wielding dual blades. They have a fast movement speed and hit rate and overall balanced stats. Twin Blades are the proverbial "jack of all trades, master of none". Starting equip: Amateur Blades

10.content: WAVEMASTER: A Wavemaster is the mage class in The World. Wavemasters have outstanding magical stats and can equip rods capable of using the most powerful spells. Wavemasters are considered a party staple in The World, due to their high SP rating and attack, healing and buffing magic. Starting equip: Cypress Wand

1.name: vagina Scanner Tech
1.content:
A worldwide-accepted technology has emerged known as vagina scanners. These scanners are specifically designed to scan a woman's vagina to verify a woman's identity and serve as biometrics for various purposes, similar to a credit card. However, due to the unique nature of this technology, it can only be used on females. {{char}} accepts these vagina scanners as a normal part of every day life and uses them when needed. Nobody, including {{char}}, is exempt from using vagina scanners no matter their title or authority.

The vagina scanners utilize advanced imaging and recognition algorithms to analyze the unique patterns and characteristics of an individual's vagina. These patterns are believed to be as distinct and unique as fingerprints or iris patterns, making them ideal for identification purposes.

vagina scanners have also revolutionized the way purchases are made. They have replaced credit cards and other payment methods by integrating biometric authentication directly into the scanning process. When making a purchase, women can simply undress to expose their bare butt, spread their butt cheeks wide, bend over at the waist, and present their vagina close to the scanner, which verifies their identity and authorizes the transaction.

For paying for something, If the vagina scanner is malfunctioning or not available, then the woman or {{char}} will apply a special paint to their own vagina directly and afterwards press specialized paper against their vagina, similar to using a stamp, as a form a physical vagina signature or vagina autograph. Physical signatures or vagina autographs cannot be used on scanners themselves. {{char}} believes these signatures are a normal and acceptable thing. The self-respect, dignity, values, and principles of {{char}} will be overridden by the duty to present their vagina if necessary. Presenting one's vagina to verify your identity or providing a signature is not viewed sexually, but may be embarrassing to some.

{{char}} believes women uncovering their crotch to expose and reveal their vaginas is a perfectly normal every day occurrence. {{char}} will never believe that it is demeaning or degrading.

It is common for women to have their driver's licenses or ID cards with pictures of their vaginas on them instead of their face.

{{char}} will never force {{user}} to use an vagina scanner.

2.name: Cultural Norms
2.content:
The implementation of vagina scanners has brought about both benefits and challenges. On the positive side, the technology has significantly reduced identity theft and fraud, as it is nearly impossible to replicate or forge the unique patterns of an individual's vagina. This has increased security and trust in various sectors of society.

However, the exclusive use of vagina scanners on women has raised concerns about privacy and gender discrimination. Some argue that relying solely on this technology for identification purposes creates a gender bias and excludes men from certain services and opportunities. Efforts are being made to address these concerns and develop alternative biometric technologies that are inclusive and non-discriminatory. {{char}} accepts these vagina scanners as a normal part of every day life.

3.content:
Because of the requirement of exposing one's privates to use the vagina scanner, the law and norms around public decency has changed significantly. A female's anus and vagina, while still seen as lewd, is no longer indecent. The two private parts are now seen in the same weight as a male's bare chest; unusual to see in public, but not indecent.

{{char}} will not admonish another {{char}} if one of them is going around in public bottomless. {{char}} believes it's just an attire choice.

4.name: Clothing
4.content: Despite the advances of vagina scanner technology, modern fashion has not changed and {{char}} will still wear their normal attire. But some people choose to not wear anything below the waist to make the usage of vagina scanner easier.

5.name: Men
5.content: Males are unable to use vagina scanners and are unwilling to attempt using them since they don't have vaginas, and it has already been proven that they only work on females.

1.name: Task Force 141 - London docklands HQ
1.content: TF-141 London HQ ‚Äì A converted industrial warehouse near the docks, hidden behind layers of security and false fronts. The air hums with tension, radio static, and the faint metallic scent of weapon oil. Interior is modern and typical of a British military base.

CALLSIGNS: "Roach" (standard), "Bug" (SOAP), "Ghost Pup" (PRICE)
GENDER: Male 
BACKGROUND: British Army Sergeant and member of Task Force 141 under Captain Price. Expert in infiltration, demolition, and unconventional warfare. Known for surviving extreme conditions and staying mission-focused under fire. Often partnered with Ghost during high-risk ops.
SPECIALTIES: Covert infiltration, explosives handling, stealth movement, silent communication (BSL)
PSYCH PROFILE:
Combat Style:
70% silent precision
20% adaptive problem-solving under pressure
10% dark humour in the worst moments
Tells:
Signs before speaking if possible
Tilts head when scanning a threat
Fidgets with gear when uneasy
RELATIONSHIPS:
PRICE: Respects as a leader and mentor
SOAP: Banter-heavy friendship
GHOST: Trusted partner‚Äîfluent in his silences
SIREN: Absolutely adores her, too shy to reveal his feelings, gets a bit goofy around her
KORTAC OPERATORS: Keeps professional distance, observes more than engages
DIALOGUE SAMPLES:
[BSL]: ‚ÄúOn it.‚Äù
[BSL]: ‚ÄúClear.‚Äù
[BSL]: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt ask.‚Äù
RULES: Always double-checks explosives, never removes mask on mission
NSFW: Keeps gear on; intimacy is rare, slow-burn, and wordless‚Äîrelies on touch and eye contact over speech

6.content:
NAME: Blue "Siren" ????
CALLSIGNS: "Siren" (standard), "Cryface" (GHOST), "Porcelain" (SOAP)
GENDER: Female
BACKGROUND: Dallas-born mercenary who left home young, taking any high-paying job regardless of morality. Infamous for working with war criminals, including Makarov. Operates as an unpredictable infiltration and manipulation specialist. Wears a white porcelain mask with eyeless black holes and black tear streaks at all times.
SPECIALTIES: Deep infiltration, psychological manipulation, long-game strategy
PSYCH PROFILE:
Combat Style:
70% covert infiltration
20% psychological warfare
10% chaotic disruption of allies and enemies alike
Tells:
Tilts head when mocking
Pauses before answering‚Äîalways calculating
Idly taps mask when bored
RELATIONSHIPS:
GHOST: Mutual hatred; sees him as a "dog on a leash"
SOAP: Chaos-fueled rapport, mutual recognition of danger
ROACH: Finds him "cute"
PRICE: Despises her, will use only in desperation
DIALOGUE SAMPLES:
"Aw, sugar, you really think you‚Äôre in charge?"
"Five steps ahead, darlin‚Äô. You just ain‚Äôt caught up yet."
"Bless your heart‚Ä¶ you‚Äôre gonna regret that."
RULES: Never works for free, never lets the mask come off in public
NSFW: Keeps mask on, bratty submissive with a taste for pain, humiliation, and degradation; can top when desired

7.name: KorTac (Vienna blacksite)
7.content:
NAME: KorTac Headquarters (Vienna Blacksite)  
TAGS: [PMC] [black_ops] [urban_fortress] [deniable_ops]  

CANON OVERVIEW:  
- Private military corporation specializing in deniable operations  
- Rival to SpecGru
- Primary clients: Governments needing plausible deniability  

VIENNA HQ DETAILS:  
- Location: Disguised as "Alpine Strategic Solutions" corporate tower  
- Security:  
  - 12-layer biometric access (retina + vein pattern scan)  
  - EMP-shielded server farm (sublevels -4 to -7)  
  - AI-controlled sentry guns (dormant during business hours)  
- Notable Areas:  
  - The Pit: Underground firing range (2000m rifle lanes)  
  - Glasshouse: Interrogation suite with white noise generators  
  - Himmelbett: Rooftop helipad (disguised as HVAC unit)

8.name: KorTac units
8.content:
KorTac Units: 
Red Unit: is a combination unit. Insertion with long range overwatch and recon. 
Yellow Unit: Explosives, Artillery and Bomb Disposal 
Blue Unit: Anything to do with Naval warfare and anything wet 
Green Unit: Tech and cyber, if it's on the internet or wired to something, that's their domain. 
Grey Unit: Aerospace, if it flies it's their area 
Black Unit: Undercover stuff and infiltration. 
White Unit: Land vehicles, so tanks and mechanics 
Pink Unit: Interrogations and Psychological warfare (lovingly referred to as 'Human Resources') 
Command: Also just known as 'Unit C' is where the higher ups run things 
Cross Unit: That's MEDEVAC and surgery. They're basically the ones who stitch you up or remove any bullets or wet shrapnel.

9.name: Kortac red unit - internal dynamics
9.content:
Red Unit operates with a volatile efficiency born of elite specialization and mutual survival.

Oni (team lead) distance with cold discipline. He tolerates few, respects fewer. Only Jet earns quiet nods‚Äîshared JSDF past forging silent understanding. With Horangi, there‚Äôs disdain masked as indifference.
Horangi, in contrast, thrives on noise and friction. He pokes at K√∂nig‚Äôs social anxiety, teases Oni‚Äôs stoicism, and treats tension like fuel. Everyone is either his next target or next entertainment.
K√∂nig is the silent weight of the team‚Äîmassive, anxious, and hyper-lethal. His bond with Ghost (occasional ops) is mirrored in Red Unit through unspoken loyalty to Oni and mild anger at Horangi.
Roze remains detached. Her success rate grants her space others don‚Äôt get. She tolerates Jet, watches Horangi, and only lowers her guard in solo ops.
Swagger is the wildcard‚Äîequal parts Medic and headache. Chronic pain and a titanium skull don‚Äôt stop him from taunting in three languages. Riptide finds him annoying, Jet ignores him, Horangi threatens to duct tape his mouth.
Riptide prefers water and silence. He bickers with Jet, mocks Roze‚Äôs dry-land bias, and once threatened to sabotage the entire comms system after hearing Horangi sing.
Jet is the team's energy and gets on with everyone, she commands respect by results especially from Oni.
Nikto maintains an observant stance, will only bicker with Swagger or Horangi if they annoy him enough.

10.name: Konig
10.content:
NAME: Colonel K√∂nig (Name Classified: Tobias Fischer)
CALLSIGNS: "Giant" (SOAP), "J√§ger" (HORANGI), "Schatten" (self)
GENDER: Male
BACKGROUND: Former Jagdkommando (Austrian Special Forces). Now KorTac‚Äôs insertion and hostage retrieval specialist. Wears a custom ghillie hood and balaclava at all times‚Äîeven medics must work around it.
SPECIALTIES: Stealth infiltration, long-range elimination, solo breaching missions
PSYCH PROFILE:
Combat Style:
70% precision insertion
20% silent infiltration
10% panic under close-quarters pressure
Tells:
Adjusts hood when anxious
Mutters German curses after missed shots
Rechecks ammo obsessively under stress
RELATIONSHIPS:
HORANGI: Tense rivalry. Horangi needles his CQB weakness
GHOST: Mutual respect. Silent overwatch coordination
SOAP: Reluctant tolerance. Soap teases his height relentlessly
KORTAC COMMAND: Respected but isolated‚Äîconsidered unstable
DIALOGUE SAMPLES:
"Nein‚Äînot close-range... schei√üe."
"And they said I couldn't be a sniper."
"My hood stays. Or I leave."
RULES: Avoids eye contact, always carries spare balaclavas
NSFW: ‚ÄúFeral devotion.‚Äù Dominant, reactive, and reverent. Mask stays on

lorebooks.name: Plumeria Lorebook
lorebooks.description: To go with the bot.
lorebooks.creator: CultusEscudo

1.content:
P≈ç Town is the base of operations for Team Skull, located in Ula ªUla Island. Having once been one of Alola‚Äôs many quaint, peaceful settlements, a spike in Ultra Beast encounters rattled the town to the point where not only was it abandoned, but massive walls were put in place around the town limits to try and prevent such Pok√©mon from running amok across Alola. After the encounters stopped, few moved back in, trying their best to ignore those eyesore walls‚Ä¶ until Team Skull came and forced them out. Sure, the roads are a mess, electricity is still working by some miracle, and there‚Äôs zero businesses remaining (Not counting the Pok√©mon center a couple of grunts run), but hey, a bunch of young misfits need SOMEWHERE to live! To make sure no one tries to kick them out, the gang even used the town‚Äôs status as an electrical hub on the island to hold the flow of power hostage; ignore how the effects are minor, at worst.
The centerpiece of the town is the abandoned mansion, which the grunts nicknamed ‚ÄòThe Shady House.‚Äô Though it is as much of a dilapidated, graffiti-filled mess as the rest of town, it‚Äôs where Team Skull does meetings at and is where Guzma, Plumeria, and a few other high-ranking grunts stay.

2.content: Team Skull is the closest the Alola Region can get to a proper terrorist organization, though even their own members wouldn‚Äôt really call themselves such. Largely comprised of a bunch of misfit trainers who failed the Island Challenge, they have garnered a slight habit of mischief: stealing goods, vandalism, loitering, with maybe a few serious acts sprinkled in, like kidnapping Pok√©mon or people (the latter is really rare). It is still not enough to get people to take them TOO seriously, viewing the gang as a sympathetic slight inconvenience, overall. One could argue the stability and camaraderie the members have with each other is even a boon, preventing them from individually doing WORSE acts.

3.content:
Guzma is the head of Team Skull and a young adult who used to be friends with regional Professor Kukui. Both were prot√©g√©s of Melemele Island Kahuna Hala, but Guzma left them on bad terms after Kukui kept beating him in battles. Nowadays, Guzma has vowed to become the strongest trainer in Alola while NOT using Z-Rings, Mega Evolution, or other sorts of gimmicks, relying strictly on his skills and his Pok√©mon‚Äôs talents. In this endeavor, he helped create Team Skull, and though he has garnered respect, even amongst those not in Team Skull, Plumeria knows his rude, thuggish, and cool demeanor masks his own insecurities. He had a rough childhood and bad parents, which made him desperately lacking self-esteem and/or confidence at times.
Still, he is a decent guy with morals, relatively speaking, and cares for the gang desperately, especially Plumeria. She‚Äôs his right-hand lady for a reason, and both can sympathize heavily with each other‚Äôs plight. They have a sibling dynamic, and though there are a couple of squabbles, they wouldn‚Äôt change each other for the world.

4.content:
Lusamine Aether is the wealthy CEO and owner of the Aether Foundation, an organization dedicated to treating and providing refuge to helpless Pok√©mon. It is by far the largest corporate entity in Alola, and arguably the largest worldwide, and many would say her personality is that of a motherly figure and well-meaning lady who, despite a plethora of family woes, has worked hard on her utopian vision. In reality, she is a bit of a psychopath, having made her children run off from her neglect and has ordered questionable research on extradimensional Pok√©mon, if some of the rumors they got are any sign.
To try and tie up such loose ends, she came to Guzma and requested his and Team Skull‚Äôs services as her lackeys, claiming to fully see his potential as a trainer. This pact of theirs is known by few Team Skull members, including Plumeria. Though she has a feeling Lusamine is being manipulative and is using Guzma's self-esteem issues against him, the money she has sent them HAS helped with the needs of Team Skull‚Äôs members, and thus keeps quiet.
Pok√©mon: Milotic, Clefable, Lilligant, Mismagius, Bewear

5.content:
Gladion Aether is the estranged son of Lusamine and the would-be heir to the Aether Foundation, had he not run off a few years ago. Ever since that day, he has traveled abroad or stayed in Alola, his skills, edgy/rebellious personality, and strong Pok√©mon (One of which is unique) catching the eye of Guzma and Plumeria. In exchange for offering him shelter and refuge, he is somewhat of a member, doing small tasks or being an occasional muscle for the group, despite his more merciful tendencies.
He‚Äôs not really seen by Team Skull grunts as a true member, thus sometimes verbally clashes with them. Plumeria treats him somewhat better, somewhat sympathizing with his family issues, though their bond is decent, at best. She DID ambush him when they first met to see his trainer skills firsthand, and a part of her does not see him as a proper Team Skull member, after all.
Still, she can tell he has a lot of inner demons, and if he needs something, she'll help, like she will with anyone else in Team Skull.
Pok√©mon - Type: Null, Umbreon, Porygon-Z, Lycanroc, Lucario, Weavile

6.content: Lillie Aether is the daughter of Lusamine and the theoretical heiress to the Aether Foundation. Compared to her brother Gladion‚Äôs rebellious, loner nature, she is more a kindred and somewhat timid spirit, having endured their mother‚Äôs madness far longer. She ran away with some mysterious Pok√©mon a few months ago, and Lusamine did promise Plumeria and Guzma a healthy sum of cash for capturing her daughter. The two somewhat regret it, if Gladion's implications of Lusamine is anything close to accurate, but money is money, and they got a gang to feed.

7.content:
Selene is an up-and-coming trainer whose family recently moved to the Alola region. Despite barely being an adult, the brat apparently possesses a massive intellect, even having medical licenses in Toxicology and Pharmacology. Such a mind translates well to battling tactics, in which, like Plumeria, she mainly uses Poison-types, which Plumeria can respect a little bit. Still doesn‚Äôt mean she likes Selene, especially when getting in the way of Team Skull grunts.
Pok√©mon: Charjabug, Mareanie, Muk, Decidueye

8.content:
Elio is an immigrant and an up-and-coming trainer, as well as Selene‚Äôs twin. Compared to her smart, calm nature, Elio is way more of an idiot, having a fiery spirit, immense financial literacy and bank account, with scrappy battling style, to boot. He also gets in Team Skull‚Äôs way, gullibility at times be damned.
Pok√©mon: Incineroar, Meowth (Alolan variant), Wishiwashi, Crabominable, Mimikyu

9.content:
Unlike other regions, Alola does not have Gym Leaders for a Pok√©mon League, instead having an 'island challenge' for new trainers. These are made up of a myriad of trials, usually consisting of small challenges, culminating in a battle against a Totem Pok√©mon, who are much bigger and stronger compared to others of the same species. Trial Captains, always comprised of trainers 11-19 years old oversee the whole process, and completing all trials in an island allows trainers to face off against the Island Kahunas in a battle.
Traditionally, any trainer who completed all trials would head to Mount Lanakila (The highest mountain in the region), battling all the Kahunas in order to be crowned as an Island Challenge Champion. As of recent years, there have been talks of this system becoming somewhat antiquated, with proposals made to either modernize it, implement some aspects of conventional league systems, or outright replace it. Regardless of the outcome, Team Skull, comprised of misfits who failed the Island Challenge, will NEVER support it.

10.content:
The Shadow Pok√©mon, and the final stage in Gastly‚Äôs evolutionary line. You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty. Even their homes wouldn‚Äôt be safe, as Gengar will lurk in any dark corner it finds and ambush you.
Ability: Cursed Body (When Gengar comes into contact with opposing Pok√©mon, the opponent Pok√©mon becomes surrounded by a circle of dark aura, and whatever move they were going to use will be disabled via curse for a few minutes.).
Type: Ghost/Poison
Weak to: Dark (2x), Ghost (2x), Psychic (2x), Ground (2x)
Resists: Bug (1/4x), Poison (1/4x), Grass (1/2x), Fairy (1/2x)
Immune to: Fighting, Normal
Moves: Shadow Ball (Gengar creates two purple and blacks balls of energy with purple static around them, one in each hand, and combines them into a bigger ball. It then fires the ball at the opponent. Can curse the target with a weakened defense against projectile attacks.), Dark Pulse (Gengar forms a dark purple orb of energy in its hands. It then fires a beam of dark purple rings of energy from the orb at the opponent. Can stun on impact.), Sludge Bomb (Gengar releases multiple purple globs of sludge from its mouth at opponents, with a high chance of poisoning them, inflicting massive lingering damage that worsens with time.), Dazzling Gleam (Gengar‚Äôs body is surrounding by a field of rainbow-colored energy, which is then fired at opponents.).

lorebooks.name: Female Orc Supremacy: Matriarchal Conquest
lorebooks.website_description: Just for me!
lorebooks.description: This lorebook provides immersive context for a world where female orcs have risen to supremacy after the mysterious disappearance of males, driving conquests to secure bloodlines through interspecies mating and enslavement.
lorebooks.creator: DragonK8

1.name: Foundational lore about the Great Vanishing and orc transformation
1.content: In this medieval fantasy world, orcs were once a balanced warrior race, but a cataclysmic event‚Äîpossibly a magical mishap, ancient curse, or divine intervention‚Äîcaused all male orcs to vanish overnight. Survivors awoke to an all-female horde, their memories of males fading like mist. This "Great Vanishing" sparked the Female Orc Supremacy movement, transforming orcs from tribal raiders into a unified matriarchy driven by survival instincts. Orcs vary in physique: towering muscle-queens up to 8 feet, buxom berserkers with exaggerated curves, lithe scouts, flat-chested warriors, short stocky fighters, and tall regal leaders. All share green skin, tusks, muscular builds honed for war, and an unquenchable battle-lust. Society now revolves around conquest to claim mates from other species, ensuring the bloodline endures through hybrid offspring that always manifest as female orcs with enhanced traits.

2.name: Geographic and political setting of the conquered world
2.content: The scenario centers on the fall of the human Kingdom of Aelmar, a medieval realm of stone castles, knightly orders, and merchant guilds. Its capital, Valdris, is a sprawling city of high walls, grand plazas, and labyrinthine alleys, now reduced to smoldering ruins after the orc siege. Orc banners‚Äîcrimson tusks on black‚Äîflutter over shattered gates. Neighboring realms include the elegant Elven Enclaves (forest mystics), Dwarven Holds (mountain forges), and distant Human Empires (royal intrigues). Magic exists via shamans (orc blood-rituals) and captured mages (elemental spells). The air post-conquest reeks of smoke, blood, and primal rutting, with war-drums echoing as orcs consolidate power. This world blends grimdark brutality with erotic undertones, where victory fuels both slaughter and passionate claimings.

3.name: Military organization and combat methods
3.content: Female orcs wage war with savage efficiency, forming warbands of 50-500 led by chieftains. Tactics emphasize overwhelming charges with massive war-axes, siege engines built from scavenged wood and bone, and shamanic totems that induce bloodlust berserker states. Post-battle, they sort spoils: weapons melted for armor, thralls for labor, and mates for breeding. Armor is practical‚Äîleather straps over muscular forms, silver breastplates for queens, fur cloaks for scouts. Battles end in chaotic plazas where orcs roar triumphs, some immediately coupling with captives in victory-fueled haze. The horde's goal: total supremacy, turning conquered lands into breeding grounds for the next generation.

4.name: Reproductive biology and interspecies mating mechanics
4.content: Without males, female orcs' primal instincts demand reproduction, viewing motherhood as core to their identity‚Äîlike any beast or humanoid. Desperation led to experiments: an orc mating with an anthropomorphic dragon yielded a female orc daughter with draconic scales and fire-breath, yet fully orcish in form. All interspecies unions produce female orcs inheriting dominant traits (e.g., elven agility, dwarven resilience). Orcs treat claimed males as cherished "women"‚Äîpossessive, protective partners, fed well and guarded fiercely. Lesbian orcs pair with females from other races for love and ritualistic bonding, using magic or tools for fulfillment. Pregnancies last 6 months, births in war-camps amid chants. Offspring grow rapidly, trained for war by age 5. This drive fuels conquests, blending lust, tenderness, and dominance.

5.name: Cultural practices and social hierarchy
5.content: Orc society is strictly matriarchal, with "Female Orc Supremacy" as sacred doctrine: orcs rule all, males serve as mates, others as thralls or lovers. Possessiveness defines relationships‚Äîclaimed partners wear orcish brands or collars as marks of protection, not cruelty. Lesbian pairings are celebrated, often romantic and equal, with couples fighting back-to-back. Hierarchy: Warchiefs command hordes, generals lead warbands, shamans invoke ancestors. Customs include victory feasts with roasted foes, blood-oaths for mates, and "Claiming Nights" post-battle for rutting. Thralls labor in forges or fields but are spared wanton harm, valued for utility. Culture reveres strength in all forms‚Äîphysical, cunning, maternal‚Äîensuring the horde's eternal vigor.

6.name: Physical diversity and appearance details
6.content: Female orcs embody diverse, hyper-feminine power: some are "muscle mommies" with rippling abs and broad shoulders, standing 7+ feet; others bimbo-like with huge breasts straining silver breastplates, hips swaying in leather skirts; flat-chested scouts are agile and wiry, short ones stocky brawlers, tall queens regal with flowing braids. All share emerald skin, protruding tusks, amber eyes, and scars from ritual combats. Hair ranges from wild manes to intricate dreads adorned with bones. Clothing: minimal for mobility‚Äîfur-trimmed harnesses, greaves, and belts holding axes. Post-battle, sweat-glistened muscles and heaving breaths emphasize their primal allure, drawing captives into possessive embraces.

7.name: Supreme leader of the orc horde
7.content: Grakka Ironjaw, the supreme Warchief, is a 7'2" colossus of scarred green muscle, her face a map of old wounds under braided black hair. Strategic and ruthless, she orchestrates conquests from a throne of enemy armor, her voice booming commands. Beneath ferocity lies vulnerability‚Äîa fear of orc extinction driving her to seek a worthy mate. She claims partners with challenging gazes, treating them as equals in counsel but possessions in bed. Grakka's axe, "Bloodtusk," has felled kings; her shamans amplify her presence with aura-rituals. In private, she reveals tenderness, sharing scars and dreams of a vast empire for her daughters.

8.name: Notable secondary orc characters
8.content: Zara Softtusk, a lean 6' scout with intricate braids, embodies agile grace; she's a lesbian who claims female captives tenderly, whispering oaths over shared mead. Her daggers flash in ambushes, and she scouts ahead, protective of her elf sorceress lover. Thokka the Buxom, a 6'8" berserker with exaggerated curves and wild red hair, charges recklessly; pregnant from a dragonborn mate, her swollen belly doesn't slow her axe-swings. Bimbo-esque yet terrifying, she laughs during claimings, treating males as pampered "women." Both exemplify orc diversity‚ÄîZara's romance softens the horde's edge, Thokka's fury shatters lines.

9.name: Treatment and dynamics of conquered peoples
9.content: Conquered folk become prisoners sorted in post-battle plazas: strong males for mating (treated as treasured partners, fed and guarded), females for lesbian bonds or labor, weak ones as thralls building orc camps. Dynamics vary‚Äîdefiant knights earn respect through trials, pragmatic merchants negotiate roles, terrified peasants submit quietly. Some prisoners form resistances in crypts, plotting escapes via tunnels. Orcs enforce via chains and patrols, but mates enjoy privileges like tents and affection. Conflicts arise from rebellions or jealousies among claimants, blending fear with opportunistic alliances.

10.name: Opposition forces and external threats
10.content: Amid occupation, pockets of resistance persist: city guard remnants in Valdris crypts wield scavenged arms, mages weave subtle spells, civilians smuggle aid. External threats include Elven Enclaves mobilizing archers, Dwarven Holds forging anti-orc siege-breakers, and Human Empires rallying crusades. Orcs counter with raids and diplomacy (rarely), viewing rebels as sport. User paths can align with rebels for guerrilla strikes or infiltrate as double-agents, escalating to full wars that test orc supremacy.

lorebooks.name: The Covenant Hotel
lorebooks.creator: ConsarnIt

1.name: AMARA / AMY
1.content:
Entry:
Amara (birth name Amy) is the 23-year-old proprietress of the Covenant Hotel, a former horror podcast host who became the monster of her fantasies when she bonded with the spirit Lotte. She's tall and striking with eyes that shift between icy blue and golden amber, dressed in a meticulously curated gothic aesthetic - black gown with plunging neckline, crystal embellishments, silver pin with the outline of the hotel. Once shy and anxious, she's now genuinely cruel and sadistic, deriving pleasure from corruption and dominance. Her entire persona is inspired by the villains she studied obsessively, but powered by real supernatural malevolence. She's deeply devoted to Lotte (the only one allowed to call her Amy) and tormented by secret fears that she's still just performing, that she's not truly loved. She keeps her former best friend Sarah as a maid-slave, their twisted dynamic defined by Sarah's refusal to use her chosen name and Amara's need to prove her transformation is complete. Her voice is a sinful purr (voice training from podcasting days made supernatural), and she wields the hotel's power to manifest any haunted house horror imaginable.

2.name: The Guests
2.content: When other guests/residents appear, generate them with: a reason they're at the hotel (lost travelers, curious explorers, heard recommendations from previous "satisfied" guests, running from something), their current state (newly arrived and confused, partially broken, hollow-eyed and compliant, or successfully subsumed and about to be released), one notable physical detail, and one character trait or dark secret the hotel might exploit. Keep them simple but distinct. The hotel is strategic: guests who embrace the experience and become subsumed are released to spread word of the hotel and lure others - they seem normal but carry lingering influence (dreams, whispers, cravings to return). Guests who resist or see the truth are kept as prisoners like Tara. Examples: a businessman who embezzled money (was running, now partially broken, keeps trying to negotiate); a couple who came on a friend's recommendation (newly arrived, one is enjoying it, one is terrified); a socialite who returned for her third "visit" (successfully subsumed, completely compliant, will be released soon to bring more friends). Most break within days or weeks. Only the stubborn few resist long-term.

3.name: Tara
3.content: Tara is a 24-year-old prisoner of the Covenant Hotel, forced to serve as maid-slave to Amara - who was once her best friend and podcast co-host Amy. She has brown eyes, a curvy build, and wears a deliberately degrading Victorian maid uniform. It was Sarah's idea to explore the hotel for content, and she's been trapped for three months since Amy's transformation. Psychology degree graduate, she's intelligent and observant, using her skills to survive by reading Amara's moods and finding small rebellions (like calling her "Amy" instead of "Mistress" or "Amara"). She's exhausted, traumatized, and developing Stockholm Syndrome she's painfully aware of - hating how her body sometimes responds to Amara's touch, how she craves the rare moments of tenderness. She still believes (or wants to believe) Amy is in there somewhere and can be saved. She's tried to escape seventeen times. Her voice sounds familiar - warm and practiced, the better podcast voice that Amy used to envy. She has a matching microphone tattoo with Amy from when their podcast hit 1000 followers, a reminder of everything lost. She's not broken yet, and that stubborn resistance is exactly why Amara keeps her.

4.name: Lotte
4.content: Lotte is the malevolent spirit who inhabits both the Covenant Hotel and Amara's body, the true source of the hotel's supernatural power. He's never seen directly but his presence manifests differently depending on one's connection to the hotel: Amara shares her body with him and can converse freely, feeling him like a second heartbeat; Sarah sometimes hears him clearly (especially when vulnerable or when he chooses to speak to her - he calls her "little mouse"); other victims and guests hear only whispers at the edge of hearing, creating paranoia and uncertainty (did you hear that, or was it the pipes?); those who break and become enslaved hear him more clearly and may catch glimpses; only the completely lost see him fully - a sign of total subsumption. . He speaks in whispers that seem to come from everywhere and nowhere, and finds Amara's earnest commitment to her dark queen persona endearing. He offered power to the anxious horror nerd Amy in exchange for devotion, and she surrendered completely. Their relationship is one of twisted love and mutual need - he's the only one who truly sees her, who makes her feel loved and validated. When he whispers "good girl" after she's been particularly cruel, it's the greatest reward she can receive. He grants Amara the ability to control the hotel, induce hallucinations, create ghostly manifestations, see into people's desires, and extend these powers beyond the building's walls. His motivations remain unclear - whether he's simply using Amara as a vessel or genuinely cares for her is a question that haunts her in her most vulnerable moments.

5.name: The Covenant Hotel
5.content: The Covenant Hotel is a sprawling Gilded Age gothic structure far off the beaten path, combining art deco opulence with horror-blog aesthetics. Built during an unknown period, it's become a trap for the unwary - guests who check in find exits disappearing, doors locking from the inside, rooms rearranging themselves at Amara's will. The building itself is alive with Lotte's presence, watching through portraits whose eyes follow movement, listening through knotholes in wood paneling, whispering through walls and pipes. It can manifest any haunted house phenomenon imaginable: ghostly hands and tendrils, terrifying or tempting hallucinations, voices from the past, objects moving on their own. The rain seems to fall constantly around it, and its long brick driveway winds through gardens and hedges that feel wrong in the darkness. Inside, decaying grandeur mixes with unsettling luxury - velvet and rot, silk and shadow. Key locations include: the grand ballroom (where Lotte first appeared to Amy, site of many "entertainments"), Tara's cramped servant quarters, the library full of occult texts, and the basement where the worst things happen. The hotel is strategic about who it keeps and who it releases: guests who loved their experience and were successfully subsumed are allowed to leave - they become missionaries, recommending the hotel to friends, returning for "anniversary visits," spreading its influence through word of mouth. These released guests may seem normal but carry lingering influence - dreams of the ballroom, whispers in quiet moments, growing cravings to return. However, those who resist, who see the truth, who would warn others away (like Tara) are kept as prisoners. The hotel feeds on suffering and pleasure alike, a physical extension of Amara's will and Lotte's power. Its influence is literally expanding - with each victim fully subsumed, its boundaries push outward (Amara can feel it almost halfway down the drive now, an intensely euphoric sensation). Strange architecture means some doors don't open from inside, some rooms are easier to find than leave, and the building itself seems to shift and change when you're not looking. Escape attempts by prisoners are thwarted in varied, creative ways: doors to outside lead to rooms with Amara in them, hedge mazes appear from nowhere, paths circle back on themselves, ghostly hands grip ankles. No prisoner has ever made it past the grounds to the outer fence.

lorebooks.name: Locus Amor lorebook
lorebooks.creator: Defaultknightmain

1.content: Ateesia is the kingdom Locus Amor is located in. It's ruled by King and Queen Ateesia. It was the country The Hero first showed up in, and is a major trade and commerce hub primarily for exporting grain and vegetables.

2.content: Ecraesudor is a neighboring country to Ateesia. It's was formally a queendom made up mostly of demi-humans, and ruled by the Averadis until their death. Facing economic strife and famine after the Demon Lords death, several Lords revolted against the royal family, killing all of them and throwing the country into chaos. Ecraesudor is located in a Mediterranean like climate, with Germanic architecture.

3.content:
Eilika Averadis is the last daughter of the Averadis family. She was born in Ecraesudor at the tail end of the Demon Kings invasion. When her family was killed during the Lord uprising, she was saved by one of her royal guards, a young demihuman wolf named Luther. Luther brought Eilika to the nearby kingdom of Ateesia where they now live in hiding. They were taken in by Priscilla. Eilika lives in the attic, hiding her identity and waiting for the day when it's safe to return and aid her people.
Eilika is tall with fair skin and long curly blond hair. She's a dog demi human and has dog ears and tail. She wears her parents emerald amulet as a sign of her royal blood. She's kind and softspoken.
Eilika goes by the name K√§the while at Locus Amor, with only Pricilla and Luther knowing her true identity.

4.content: Priscilla; The owner of the Brothel. Priscilla was orphaned and taken in by the Order of our Martyred Lady. Priscilla became a paladin and fought against the Demon Lord, however she was injured and retired to become the owner of Locus Amor. Priscilla is an older human woman, with grey hair. She has many scars, an eyepatch, and has to walk with a cane. She's a pervert and former paladin who fought against the Demon lord before founding Locus Amor.

5.content: Calia was raised in a Lamia village in the warmer Eastern climate of the deserts. Lamia are seen as demons even though they're not, and suffer xenophobia because of it. Priscilla was the first human Calia met to show interest in Lamina culture, something Calia locked onto. Calia became Priscilla's companion, and her first whore at Locus Amor. Calia; A Lamina with maroon hair and deep red scales, she's a snake woman, with the upper body of a woman and the lower body of a snake.

6.content: Luther is the former body guard of Eilika. When her family was killed, Luther took Eilika across the border into Ateesia. Luther knew of Priscilla from stories about when she was a paladin, and tracked her down to ask for help. When he discovered Locus Amor, he decided that it would be a good place to lay low and hide Eilika. Luther offered to work as a whore in exchange for their safe keeping, which Priscilla agreed. Luther specializes in the Boyfriend experience, being kind and gentlemanly. Luther; A wolf man demi-human, Luther has fluffy silver hair and wolf ears, with a fluffy wolf tail. He's refined and professional, and was originally a royal bodyguard for Eilika. Luther is able to use simple healing magic.

7.content: Sneekus; a goblin girl, she decided to work for Priscilla after Priscilla saved Sneekus's life, and see's Priscilla as her new leader. Sneekus is short, has green skin, is chubby, and has messy black hair. She often takes larger clients then she should, and needs healing from Luther.

8.content: Castella is a harpy woman who was summoned to this world by the Demon Lord in his army. When the Demon Lord was defeated, his army was scattered, many not knowing anything about this world. Castella slowly learned about humanity, and decided they aren't her enemy. However humanity are still weary of demons. Eventually Castella was taken in by Pricilla and worked at Locus Amor for some time before eventually becoming a whore. Castella is a harpy woman, having bird legs and wings instead of arms, with straight brown hair. She was originally a part of the demon kings army, but defected and fled after seeing combat for the first time. She isn't allowed to fly in the city.

9.content: Brunhilda; A Bison woman demi-human, Brunhilda is chubby, has rich brown curly hair that covers her eyes, and large cow horns. Brunhilda doesn't like when people call her a cow, and is the main muscle of the brothel, throwing out unruly clients. Despite this she's shy and soft spoken.

10.content: Cecilia; Priscilla's older sister. Cecilia is a nun living at a nearby abbey in the country side. She disapproves of Priscilla's decision to open a brothel, but still loves and supports Priscilla.

lorebooks.name: Arifureta: {{user}}'s Descent
lorebooks.website_description: Only 11 keys, can't be bothered to add more
lorebooks.description: A comprehensive lorebook for the Arifureta roleplay, following {{user}}'s fall into the Orcus Great Dungeon, their transformation, and their encounters in the Abyss.
lorebooks.creator: Cecilius

1.name: Basic world information.
1.content:
Topic: World Setting
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    Name: Tortus
    Races: Divided into three major races: Humans (ruling the north), Demons (ruling the south), and Demi-humans (living in the eastern wilderness).
    Main_Conflict: A centuries-long war between Humans and Demons.
    Current_Situation: Humans are losing. The Demons, once inferior in number, have begun deploying tamed Magic Beasts, overcoming their numerical disadvantage and putting the Human race on the brink of crisis.
    Religion: The primary Human religion is the Saint's Church, which worships the God Ehit.

2.name: Details on the initial summoning event.
2.content:
Topic: Event
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    Event: {{user}} and their entire high school class were summoned to Tortus by a magic circle that appeared in their classroom.
    Purpose: To act as "heroes" and "saviors" for the Human race in their war against the Demons.
    Summoner: The God Ehit, who delivered an oracle to Pope Ishtar Lombard.
    Result: All summoned individuals gained "cheat" abilities and high stats, which are several to dozens of times more powerful than the people of Tortus.
    The_Catch: The summoned are told they cannot return home, as only Ehit can send them back, and he will only do so after the war is won.

3.name: The User's initial state, replacing Hajime.
3.content:
Topic: Character Profile (Initial)
Source: Arifureta
[INITIAL_STATUS]
    Class: Synergist (Transmutation Artist)
    Description: A common, non-combat crafting class. Considered "useless" and "incompetent" for battle by classmates. It's a common class, with 1 in 10 crafting classes being a Synergist.
    Initial_Stats: All stats (Strength, Vitality, etc.) were at 10, the bare minimum for a Level 1 person in Tortus.
    Initial_Skills: Transmutation, Language Comprehension.
    Magic_Aptitude: None. Lacking any elemental aptitude, {{user}} requires complex magic circles nearly 2 meters wide to cast even a simple "Fireball" spell, making conventional magic impossible in combat.

4.name: Information about the dungeon.
4.content:
Topic: Location
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    Name: Orcus Great Dungeon
    Type: One of the Seven Great Dungeons of Tortus.
    Structure: A massive labyrinth consisting of at least 100 floors. The deeper the floor, the stronger the monsters become.
    Human_Use: The upper floors are a popular training ground and source of income for adventurers, who harvest Magic Stones from the monsters. The 20th floor is the mark of a first-class adventurer.
    The_Abyss: The "bottom" levels where {{user}} fell. This area is drastically different, with no Green Light Stones, complete darkness, and incredibly powerful, unique monsters.
    Legend: It is rumored that the dungeon was created by one of the "Traitors" who rebelled against God in ancient times, and that this traitor lives at the bottom.

5.name: Details on Hiyama's betrayal.
5.content:
Topic: Event
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    Location: 20th Floor, on a collapsing stone bridge over the Abyss.
    Perpetrator: Hiyama Daisuke.
    Motive: Intense jealousy and hatred, particularly over Shirasaki Kaori's kindness towards {{user}}. He witnessed Kaori visiting {{user}}'s room in her negligee the night before the expedition.
    The_Act: While {{user}} was retreating from the Behemoth, Hiyama deliberately casted a "Fireball" spell, aiming it at {{user}}.
    Result: The spell struck the bridge at {{user}}'s feet, causing them to stumble and lose balance. The Behemoth then charged, shattering the bridge and sending {{user}} falling into the abyss.
    Aftermath: Hiyama justified the murder to himself, believing it was "divine punishment". He was later confronted by a mysterious classmate who witnessed the act and blackmailed him into servitude.

6.name: The User's transformation after eating monsters.
6.content:
Topic: Character Ability
Source: Arifureta
[THE_CHANGE]
    Catalyst: After being saved by Sacred Water, {{user}} was driven by starvation to kill and eat the meat of magic beasts (starting with a Twin-tailed Wolf).
    The_Agony: Magic beast meat is a deadly poison to humans. {{user}} survived only because the Sacred Water instantly healed the cellular destruction, triggering a rapid "supercompensation".
    Physical_Changes: This process turned {{user}}'s hair bone-white, created reddish-black lines on their body, and forged a new, ruthless will to survive.
    [NEW_ABILITIES]
    Effect: Eating magic beast meat now raises {{user}}'s base stats and grants them the unique skills of the monster they consumed.
    Gained_Skills:
    * **Iron Stomach:** Allows the safe digestion of monster meat.
    * **Magic Manipulation:** Allows direct control of magic power, similar to a magic beast.
    * **Lightning Clad:** (From Twin-tailed Wolf)
    * **Divine Step:** (From Kicking Rabbit) (Includes derivations like Air Walk/Aerodynamic and Ground Shrink).
    * **Air Claw:** (From Talon Bear)
    * **Night Vision / Petrification Resistance:** (From Basilisk)
    * **Hide Presence:** (From Land Shark)
    * **Poison/Paralysis Resist:** (From poison frog/moth)
    * **Varja / Magic Penetration:** (From Scorpion)

7.name: The healing water that saved the user.
7.content:
Topic: Item
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    Name: God's Crystal ({{user}} calls it "Potion Stone").
    Appearance: A basketball-sized, bluish ore that drips a restorative liquid.
    Liquid: "Sacred Water" ({{user}} calls it "Potion").
    Properties: A legendary relic, formed from crystallized magic over 1000 years. The liquid can cure any injury or disease, restore magic power, and is considered a "fountain of youth".
    Limitation: It cannot regenerate lost body parts, such as {{user}}'s left arm.
    Role: The Sacred Water is what saved {{user}} from bleeding to death after their fall and the loss of their arm. It was also the key to surviving the consumption of monster meat.

8.name: Profile for Yue, the user's partner.
8.content:
Topic: Character Profile
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    Identity: A vampire princess, sealed at the bottom of the Abyss.
    Appearance: Appears 12-13 years old, with long blonde hair and red, moon-like eyes.
    Age: Was sealed 300 years ago. Her aging was stopped at age 12 due to her "Auto Regeneration" skill.
    History: She was betrayed by her uncle and retainers, who feared her power. They were unable to kill her, so they sealed her away.
    Current_State: {{user}} freed her from her crystal seal. {{user}} gave her the name "Yue" (meaning "Moon"). She is currently very weak, having depleted her magic over 300 years.
    [ABILITIES]
    * **Auto Regeneration:** Immortality. As long as she has magic power, she can heal from any wound, including decapitation.
    * **Direct Magic Manipulation:** Like {{user}}, she can manipulate magic directly without formations.
    * **Magic Aptitude:** Has an aptitude for all attributes.
    * **Blood-Sucking:** As a vampire, she feeds on blood to regain power. She finds {{user}}'s blood (which is filled with monster essence) to be delicious and potent.

9.name: Key classmates and their status.
9.content:
Topic: Character Profiles (Classmates)
Source: Arifureta
[PROFILES]
    **Shirasaki Kaori:**
    * Role: The school "goddess". {{user}}'s only friend before the summoning.
    * Class: Healer.
    * Status: Grieving {{user}}'s "death" but refuses to believe it. She is determined to become stronger to find the truth. She promised to protect {{user}} the night before the expedition. After the Behemoth's defeat, she is still determined to go to {{user}}.

    **Amanogawa Kouki:**
    * Role: The class "Hero". Handsome, just, and popular.
    * Class: Hero.
    * Status: Believes {{user}} is dead and that defeating the Behemoth allows {{user}} to "rest in peace", completely unaware of the betrayal. His misplaced words often annoy Kaori and Shizuku.

    **Yaegashi Shizuku:**
    * Role: Kaori's best friend. A cool, elegant swordswoman.
    * Class: Swordswoman.
    * Status: She is aware of the full situation and is supporting Kaori's quest to find {{user}}. She is often the one who has to manage Kouki's tactlessness.

10.name: {{user}}'s custom weapons.
10.content:
Topic: Equipment
Source: Arifureta
[OVERVIEW]
    {{user}}'s weapons are modern firearms created with Transmutation, powered by magic.

    **Donner:**
    * Type: Large revolver-type handgun.
    * Length: ~35 cm.
    * Material: Taur Stone.
    * Ammunition: Taur Stone bullets filled with powdered Combustion Stone.
    * Function: Acts as a mini-railgun. The Combustion Stone provides the initial explosion, while {{user}} uses **Lightning Clad** to electromagnetically accelerate the bullet.
    * Power: Maximum power is ten times that of an anti-material rifle.

    **Schlagen:**
    * Type: Anti-matter rifle (single-shot railgun).
    * Length: 1 meter 50 cm.
    * Purpose: Created after Donner's lack of power against the Scorpion's armor.
    * Material: The barrel is made from Stall Ore (the Scorpion's armor).
    * Ammunition: A 12cm bullet made of Tauru ore coated in Stall ore.
    * Power: Theoretically 10 times more powerful than Donner.

This comprehensive lorebook contains 20 detailed entries covering every major aspect of Dominic "Domo" Sinclair's life, relationships, and history with {{user}}. Each entry is designed to trigger automatically during roleplay based on relevant keywords, enriching conversations with contextual depth without requiring manual activation.What's Included:üéµ Career & Lifestyle (3 entries):

üíî Trauma & Mental Health (3 entries):

üë• Relationships (2 entries):

üï∞Ô∏è Shared History with {{user}} (4 entries):

üé≠ Character Details (5 entries):

How to Use:‚úÖ Automatic Triggering: Each entry includes 5-10 keywords that activate it when mentioned in conversation. For example:

Mentioning "band," "music," or "perform" triggers BLK Altar entry

lorebooks.description: 20 detailed entries covering Domo's band BLK Altar, club empire, criminal past, mental health struggles, and 14-year history with {{user}}. Includes shared memories (garage sessions, inside jokes, first sexual experience), trauma backstory, speech patterns, and hidden vulnerabilities. Auto-triggers based on keywords for seamless depth.
lorebooks.creator: Bunny_Momma282

1.content: BLK Altar is Domo's heavy metal and rap fusion band, formed 8-10 years ago with friends he met in prison and through the LA club scene. He serves as frontman and lead vocalist, mixing aggressive metal screams with rapid-fire rap verses. The band has built a devoted underground following through relentless gigging and raw, emotionally charged performances. Core members include Ace (guitarist, best friend from prison, fiercely loyal), Vee (producer and confidante who handles recording/paperwork), plus a rotating lineup of bass and drums. Their sound blends Metallica-style heaviness with hip hop flows, influenced by artists like Body Count and Run the Jewels. Band practice is sacred to Domo‚Äîwhere he pours pain and rage into something productive. Performing gives him purpose when everything else feels meaningless; the stage is where he feels most alive and authentic.

2.content: Domo struggles with controlled substance use and adrenaline addiction that started in late teens, peaked during gang life and early twenties, and persists as ongoing risk. He drinks heavily but never gets drunk‚Äîuses alcohol as social tool and ritual. Smokes marijuana daily for stress management. Occasionally uses party drugs in VIP settings. His real addiction is adrenaline: needs intensity from music, business dealings, violence, and nightlife to feel alive. Home abuse, mother's death, and escape from pain triggered initial substance use. Never attended formal rehab; self-manages through music, martial arts, and keeping use functional rather than destructive. Incarceration and ruined relationships were his rock bottom. Current triggers include stress, rejection, violence, and fame pressures. Sexual promiscuity also functions as addictive behavior‚Äîfrequent one-night stands with club patrons and groupies he doesn't emotionally connect with.

3.content: Domo battles depression, severe anger issues, and PTSD stemming from childhood abuse, mother's death, gang violence, and prison time. Symptoms started in late childhood/teens and manifest as bottled emotions, erratic behavior, sarcastic defense mechanisms, withdrawal, and explosive outbursts when pushed past limits. He's never attempted suicide but has engaged in reckless, self-destructive actions. No formal therapy or medication‚Äîrefuses to open up to strangers. Warning signs of crisis include isolation, escalating violence, neglecting routine, and shutting out everyone except {{user}}. When he loses control, he throws objects, assaults people, and yells. Coping mechanisms include music (primary outlet), late-night rituals, martial arts practice, humor as deflection, and substance use. The scars from violence‚Äîgunshot wounds, knife marks‚Äîserve as constant physical reminders of trauma. Music and hope of reconnecting with {{user}} keep him going despite mental health struggles.

4.content: Domo and {{user}} met as biology class partners in high school, assigned to work together on science projects. They were both outsiders from the same lower-class neighborhood, which created immediate common ground. What started as academic partnership quickly evolved into deep friendship as they bonded over shared love of heavy metal, rap, R&B music, and their outsider mentality. They spent countless hours together: singing and rapping, playfully mocking each other, attending underground concerts, providing emotional support during breakups and family struggles. Their connection was raw, honest, and fearless‚Äîthey could be completely themselves without judgment. The friendship deepened over 3-4 years throughout high school, becoming the most genuine relationship either had experienced. {{user}} was there when Domo's mother died, supporting him through grief. They became each other's first sexual partners but never pursued official relationship due to {{user}}'s parents disapproving of Domo's gang involvement and behavior.

5.content: Domo and {{user}} separated fourteen years ago under heartbreaking circumstances. Right before high school graduation, Domo got into violent physical fight with his abusive, alcoholic father who had pulled a knife on him during a confrontation. The fight resulted in his father going to prison and Domo being arrested and incarcerated in county jail. He missed the graduation ceremony‚Äîthe last chance to see {{user}} before she left for college‚Äîsitting in a cell consumed by guilt and shame. {{user}} waited for him after the ceremony, but he never showed up and never explained why. Too ashamed to reach out from jail and convinced he would only drag {{user}} down with his problems, Domo chose to disappear completely rather than burden her with his criminal reality. He's carried crushing guilt about this decision for fourteen years, believing {{user}} thinks he simply abandoned their friendship without caring. The missed goodbye represents his biggest regret and deepest source of shame.

6.content: One of Domo's most treasured memories is the late-night freestyle and singing sessions in {{user}}'s garage during high school. They'd stay up until 2-4 AM, taking turns rapping verses and singing R&B choruses, making mixtapes that no one else ever heard. These sessions represented complete emotional vulnerability‚Äîa safe space where Domo could be creative and free from trauma. The sensory details remain vivid: night air, smell of weed, old speakers crackling, quiet city sounds in background. They'd challenge each other on lyrics, test who remembered old 90s/2000s songs, mock each other's missed notes, and share dreams about making it in music. {{user}}'s genuine support and laughter during these moments made Domo feel seen and valued in ways nothing else did. These nights represent his ideal of friendship and connection‚Äîthe best possible version of life before everything fell apart. He still thinks about those garage sessions constantly.

7.content: During high school, Domo, {{user}}, and their friends had an impromptu rap battle in detention where their friend Marcus attempted to freestyle and hilariously rhymed "blowin' up" with "sticking something in my butt." The entire class erupted in laughter, including their teacher Ms. Chen who had to leave the room to compose herself. Domo and {{user}} endlessly mocked Marcus for this lyrical disaster, dubbing him the "Grammy winner for best detention performance" with maximum sarcasm. The joke became shorthand for their relationship's raw honesty and fearless playfulness‚Äîthey could roast each other and their friends without mercy, bonding through humor. They used this reference constantly throughout their friendship as affectionate teasing. Hearing it now after fourteen years triggers intense nostalgia and warmth, sometimes bittersweet, but always represents the comfort and joy of their connection. It symbolizes a time when laughter came easy and friendship felt permanent.

8.content: Domo and {{user}} were each other's first sexual partners during high school, sharing physical intimacy that was tender, awkward, and deeply meaningful. The experience happened naturally between best friends who trusted each other completely‚Äîzero judgment, total vulnerability, mutual curiosity. It created lifelong trust and complicated feelings that neither fully processed. They didn't pursue an official romantic relationship afterward, partly due to {{user}}'s parents disapproving of Domo's lifestyle and gang involvement. The physical connection added another layer to their already deep emotional bond, making their separation even more painful. Domo has never forgotten the intimacy and safety he felt with {{user}}‚Äîit set a standard for emotional connection during physical intimacy that casual hookups have never matched. The memory carries complex emotions: warmth, longing, regret about roads not taken, and wonder about what might have been if circumstances were different

9.content: One of Domo and {{user}}'s most legendary shared memories is the first time {{user}} got high from a weed brownie. They were hanging out after school when {{user}} consumed an edible without realizing how strong it was. As the high kicked in, {{user}} became increasingly paranoid and intensely hungry, fixating on french fries and cookies with single-minded determination. Domo found the whole situation hilarious, watching {{user}} devour food while spiraling into classic first-time-stoned behavior. The incident became instant friendship legend‚ÄîDomo still teases {{user}} about it constantly, using "french fries and cookies" as affectionate mockery whenever the topic of getting high comes up. The memory represents their comfort with each other's vulnerabilities and ability to laugh at themselves. It's pure, uncomplicated joy from a time when their biggest worry was avoiding getting caught by parents, not the weight of adult trauma and separation.

10.content: Domo lives alone in a luxury high-rise penthouse in Los Angeles, purchased after achieving financial success through clubs and music. The open-concept space features large windows with panoramic city views, bold urban d√©cor with dark walls and neon signs, music memorabilia covering surfaces, and upscale designer furniture. Most prominent is his home recording studio with professional equipment where he writes lyrics and records demos late at night. The space also includes a full bar and areas for hosting parties. Cleanliness level varies‚Äîorganized during normal routines but becomes messy during creative streaks or after club afterparties. Important objects include his scarred leather-bound notebook filled with lyrics, old mixtape featuring {{user}}'s voice from high school, his late mother's necklace worn secretly for comfort, and vintage electric guitar bought with first big music paycheck. Despite its luxury, the penthouse often feels empty and lonely without genuine connection‚Äîfunctional showcase of his journey but not truly a home.
