lorebooks.name: The main bits, duh
lorebooks.website_description: A remaster of my Kamen Rider Faiz Lorebook, because the old one didn't line with how I make ones now (btw, it is going to have all the details of the rider gears, the vehicles (other than the Auto Vajin) and many more)
lorebooks.description: This includes Orphnoch, Smart Brain and the riders, including their equipment and their vehicles
lorebooks.creator: Cflame06

1.content:
The Orphnochs are a race of creatures created when someone dies and is reborn. Each equipped with a variety of special abilities, they are considered to be the next stage in evolution, and meant to be stronger, tougher, and faster.

Every Orphnoch can interchange between their original form and a unique Orphnoch 
form, light grey in colour with characteristics of either a plant or an animal with a body armour resistant to standard small firearms blasts and its strength varies wildly among Orphnochs as good measure of one's power. Only more powerful conventional weaponry can penetrate the body armour and harm or even kill some Orphnochs, while others can withstand even the basic attacks of the Rider Gears. Orphnochs can also generate signature weapons from their bodies. While in Orphnoch form, some of their kind can assume a Hybrid Form, becoming more creature-like in form. Few Orphnochs can assume a Secondary Form, increasing their standard Orphnoch form abilities at the cost of losing self-control. An Orphnoch can change their shadow into a hologram of their original form.

There are two types of Orphnochs in the most of series: naturals who are "born" when a certain person dies and is 'resurrected' into an Orphnoch, and Sired that are created when certain people survive being attacked by an Orphnoch and become ones themselves, though weaker than those born naturally. The most unique of type that appear in the series finale are the Evolved Orphnochs, the first of this type is the Orphnoch King, which are genetically perfect to the point of being unable to resume their normal form. An Orphnoch King can remove the genetic flaw from other Orphnochs, evolving them as well at the cost of their original form.

When they die, they combust into blue flames (pink if they're killed with the Delta gear) and crumble to grey dust. They'll sometimes explode if they're killed violently enough.

All Orphnochs have their senses enhanced to a superhuman level, able to hear, smell or see great distances, tuning out background noise to focus on their target. They can also regenerate an ability as well as a first sense when the Orphnoch survived its original death, with the regenerating abilities depending on the Orphnoch in question. The stronger Orphnochs may fire energy blasts from their hands, though used a surprise attack due to its attack speed being slow and inaccurate for long distance attacks. However, the Orphnochs' greatest ability is to 'siring' other Orphnochs (similar to Vampires or Werewolves) by attacking people and (usually) stabbing them through the heart. This has a very low success rate, and usually results in killing the person in question, causing them to disintegrate. Typically, most cases of siring occur when the "sirer" is in Orphnoch form, although some Orphnochs seem to be capable of using long, skin piercing tentacles specifically for siring others while still in their normal forms.

It is shown that Orphnochs heal their wounds recover quickly; Orphnochs can be seen injured when (a) small blue flame(s) burst(s) from their wound. Unfortunately, it seems that they can only be destroyed at the hands of a being stronger than them such as a Rider or another Orphnoch; possibly because they're powerful enough to kill them, disintegrating as a result.

Former chief of Smart Brain, Hanagata, discovered the truth that few Orphnoch know of; the mortal body cannot stand such a rapid evolution, and as such, all Orphnoch are doomed to die of inevitable breakdown and disintegration upon their rebirth. This could happen within any number of years of becoming an Orphnoch, depending on their transformation into and out of Orphnoch form or use of the Rider Gears, which takes an amount of time from that person's lifespan. Others, however, have exhibited signs of early disintegration (the process starts with the skin turning grey, and slightly ash-like, before their entire body is destroyed) but subsequently showed a recovery. The only known solution to this problem is the Orphnoch King, who can "complete" Orphnochs' evolution, apparently forcing them to remain in Orphnoch form, but granting long life and a higher level of power. It was also shown that people with Orphnoch DNA injected in them can also use the Rider Gears, although they will eventually run out of said DNA after using said Gears depending on how much they were injected with, which eventually leads to their deaths.

2.content:
Smart Brain, Inc. is a conglomerate that is a front for a group of Orphnoch that sees themselves as the master race and are dedicated to the genocide of all other species and the increase of the Orphnoch population. 

They experiment in making their race even more powerful and developing weapons that only Orphnoch can use, resulting in the development of the Rider Gears.

Smart Brain is a major corporation with a corporate philosophy of "creating the future" based in Tokyo, but has since spread across the world. The company deals with everything ranging from home appliances to food. 

On the surface, it appears to function as a "public body of society." It is one of the world leading large firms with high social recognition, such as the image ads that are frequently displayed. But the actual operations is unknown to the general public, such as the products that have been developed not being delivered to the market.

In reality, it is a secret society of Orphnochs who seek to conquer the world by replacing mankind with Orphnochs. Many of the employees and executives are awakened Orphnoch, and the related companies have extremely advanced scientific and medical capabilities, such as the Rider's Gear and related tools and machines.

 When they discover someone who has recently awakened as an Orphnoch, they will dispatch an agent to contact them, accept them as their own kind, and provide them with knowledge and guidance concerning Orphnoch, all while attempting to manage and control them. 

However, those who refuse to obey will be treated as targets for elimination without mercy.

3.content:
Photon Blood is the fluid energy that is the power source for the Riders and their gears, naturally produced by an Orphnoch's body, but can also be produced by someone injected with Orphnoch DNA or those who produce Photon Blood in their body due to being injected with Orphnoch DNA.

Photon Blood is usually generated in an Orphnoch (or those who can produce Photon Blood in their body) at low levels, but when there's an extreme amount, it could be perilous due to cellular damage on a massive scale, depending on how much there is (which is why the Exceed Charges are so powerful). Photon Blood alse can spread when forcibly entered into the body, especially with Exceed Charge attacks, which is also why they're so powerful.

Lasers made up of Photon Blood, seen when Faiz, Kaixa, Delta, Psyga and Orga use their Rider Phones to shoot their target, aren't enough to cause the spreading effect, but can still cause cellular damage in the area, leaving an obvious bruise in the spot (though this bruising doesns't show on Orphnochs, they can show in their regular forms); however, when using Single Mode with the Faiz, Kaixa, Psyga and Orga, the continuous laser of Photon Blood slowly causes the spreading effect, but not enough to be lethal to their target.

When their Rider Phone is in Standby Mode (indicated when it announces "Standing by" and is inserted into the Rider's driver (or in the case of Delta, into the Delta Mover), the Mission Memory, either on the phone itself or their

Energy drills made of Photon Blood, which are formed by pointer weapons (like the Faiz Pointer, Kaixa Pointer and the Delta Blaster in Pointer Mode), are known as Photon Drills, which stun the target, and when the rider's foot enters, the drill forces its way into the target's body and causes major cellular damage on the inside and spreads. Photon Drills can be deflected by weapons or objects strong enough to do so; however, a rider could focus their foot to push through. The colour of the Photon Drill depends on the Photon Blood it is made out of (red for Faiz, known as the Crimson Smash; yellow for Kaixa, known as the gold smash; bright lilac for Delta, known as Lucifer's hammer; and gold for Orga, known as the Emperor Smash).

The rider suit formed during transformation has "Photon Streams," the pathways through which this Photon Blood flows, and it glows brightly when energy flows through it. The color of the glow and the name of the flow path differ depending on the Rider: Faiz is red (Photon Stream), Kaixa is yellow (Double Stream), Delta is white (Bright Stream), Psyga is blue (Photon Stream Ver2), and Orga is gold (Omega Stream). Faiz Axel Form increases the output of Photon Blood and changes to silver (Silver Stream). Also, Faiz Blaster Form changes to black (Blackout Stream), but this serves a different role to prevent the Photon Blood from running amok and self-destructing throughout the body.

When their Rider Phone is in Standby Mode (indicated when it announces "Standing by" and is inserted into the Rider's driver (or in the case of Delta, into the Delta Mover), the Mission Memory will program the Driver to emit Photon Blood taken from the wearer's body from the Photon Blood Emitters and travel across their body in streams (which differ from pattern and length from both the wearer and the type of Driver) and once they've fully formed, the streams will glow and harden into the Photon Stream, with small bits of Photon Blood will come off and form the Rider suit in a bright flash of light.

When the rider presses the End Call button (or removes the Delta Phone from the Delta Mover, in Delta's case), the Photon Stream glows and the suit dissolves into bits of Photon Blood, while the Photon Stream turns back into Photon Blood and flow back into the wearer's Driver (or in the case where the driver has been removed, it'll just retract to the waist, where the driver used to be, and dissolve).

Note that Riot Troopers do not have Photon Blood incorporated.

4.content:
Rider Name: Faiz

Motif: Phi (Œ¶), Shark

Rider Type: Melee & Range

Faiz is the second set of Riders, developed by the Smart Brain Corporation to protect the Orphnoch King. It has less power than the Delta Gear, but had a much greater functionality. Like most of the Rider Gears that Smart Brain developed, the Faiz armour can be equipped by Orphnoch or people implanted with Orphnoch DNA.

Transforming into Faiz slowly burns Orphnoch DNA, so people who have been implanted with this DNA will quickly run out, whereas it'd take years for that to happen in the wearer is an Orphnoch or those who can produce Photon Blood in their body by chance when Orphnoch DNA is implanted.

Faiz Armour's design & components:

HEAD:

Black Shell Met: The black helmet base of Faiz. It is a reinforced helmet developed by Smart Brain that is made of a thin, hard shell made of Sol-Metal, a rare supermetal with a hardness similar to diamond, layered in multiple layers and is equipped with an anti-shock absorption bag inside to protect the wearer's head from serious head injuries.

Extreme regulator: The metallic mouthpiece, with a wide triangular piece at the centre that points up slightly to resemble the sharp tooth of a shark. it is built in with an oxygen supply device inside, which enables the wearer to perform activities in harsh environments with extremely low oxygen levels, such as underwater, high in the sky, or places with toxic gas.

Satellite Signal: The green light that is close to the forehead of the helmet. It mainly flashes when communicating with satellites and tracking enemies. The green gauge is stably supplied, flashing greens indicate access while accessing, flashing red indicates an access error, and lights up red when communication is not possible.

Ultimate Finder: The yellowish-orange visor, split in the middle by the Photon Stream of the helmet to make it look like the Greek Phi symbol. It has an ultra-sensitive camera that converts images into electrical signals and conveys them to he wearer. It also has a scope function that allows daylight vision even in the darkness, and an X-ray camera function that allows seeing through objects. At night (or in areas with low light), it glows yellow.

Photon Stream: The red energy flow path for Photon Blood that goes along the bottom of the Black Shell Met and goes around the Ultimate Finder to form the Phi Symbol shape on the helmet.

Global feelers: The red antennae that are connected to the Photon Stream on the head, which are between the Ultimate Finder, but is away from the Satellite Signal. They communicate with the artificial satellites Eagle Sat and Hawk Eye that support Kamen Rider Faiz's systems. They can collect information as well as download new programs.

Extreme nose: The small silver metal panel at the upper forehead of the helmet. It is an olfactory organ that artificially creates a sense of smell one million times more potent than that of humans. While its sensitivity can be freely adjusted, it typically has the same olfactory powers as a dog.

Photon Terminal: The slightly long silver panel that runs vertically down the helmet, which is between the Ultimate Finder.  It is a junction ballast that connects photon streams. The Photon Blood flowing within the three terminals emits too much energy, so this equipment applies resistance so that the suit itself does not self-destruct, and it supplies power to the whole body in a stable manner. There is another Photon Terminal located on the back.

Pin Falls Sonar: the extremely sensitive audio devices on each side of the helmet that can hear a needle fall from 5km away. The sensitivity can be freely changed according to the wearer's will. They look like a right-angle triangle with two thick lines below that indent into the Black Shell Met a little.

Metal Intercooler: The heat dissipation plate for releasing excess heat released by Photon blood to the outside. In particular, electronic devices are concentrated in the head, so a large one is installed at the back of the head.

BODY:

Full Metal Lung: The silver coloured dual chestpieces at the front, split by the Photon Stream in the centre, made up of Sol-Metal, a supermetal with a hardness similar to diamond, developed by Smart Brain. It has a structure in which two shock-absorbing bags are sandwiched between four solid boards, and it can repel a tank's main gun. Heavy armour. It also has a built-in oxygen tank. When Faiz enters Axel Mode, they open up and slide upward to the middle, showing the inside of the Faiz armour.

Power Fingers: The silver, round, cone-shaped fingertips at the end of the gloves, which are strong enough to break through a 30cm iron plate, and have a supple touch so the wearer can press the keys on the Faiz Phone (hence the round cone shape).

Photon Stream: The red energy flowpaths for Photon Blood that run across the body. When Faiz is using the Exceed Charge function, a small but powerful glowing ball of Photon Blood travels through the Photon Streams and enters the weapon they have equipped (through the fingers' Photon streams if using the Faiz Shot and/or Faiz Edge, and the Energy Holster on the right leg if using the Faiz Pointer).

Sol Foam: The black reinforced bodysuit, which is made of ultra-fine metal thread made of Sol-Metal 315, which combines hardness to protect the wearer with softness, so it is flexible enough for them to move. It has a reinforced surface of soft plastic and is coated with silver.

Flex bellows: The black bellows (air bag devices) on the lower legs are used for shock absorption if the wearer jumps or falls from a certain height.

Neck Shield: The black neck shield, which is made of ultra-fine metal thread made of Sol-Metal 315, which combines hardness to protect the wearer with softness, so it is flexible enough for it is able to move. There are countless capillary cables running inside it that protects the neck from external shocks. The cables also serve to transmit information between the suit and the Black Shell Met of the helmet.

Sol-Guard: The black shoulderpads, which is made of ultra-fine metal thread made of Sol-Metal 315, which combines hardness to protect the wearer with softness, so it is flexible enough for it is able to move. It has a Photon stream going across it, with rectangular Metal Intercoolers on the front, side and back.

Metal Intercooler: The heat dissipation plate for releasing excess heat generated by Photon blood to the outside. The ones on the body are connected to the Full Metal Lung and go to the back of the shoulders, while the others are on the Sol-Guard

Knee Folder: The silver knee guard, made of Sol-Metal 228, with a higher hardness of Sol-Metal. It consists of two metal boards and one shock absorber. While protecting your knees, it also serves as a powerful striking weapon. It also has the Photon Stream of the legs running over it.

Power Anklet: the silver control terminal to focus power on the legs when kicking. In addition, the bellows-shaped flex bellows surrounding the calf absorb the intense impact of a kick or falling from great heights.

Energy Holster: An energy amplification terminal mount mechanism to set the Faiz pointer when firing the "Crimson Smash" finisher. It is located on the lower right leg.

Spin Pad: The black protective pads that protect the spine and central Photon Stream. It works a bit like an airbag when the wearer falls and collides on their back.

5.content:
Rider Form name: Axel Form

Form belongs to: Faiz

Axel Form is a temporary transformation that allows Faiz to move at the speed of sound for roughly 10 seconds. His physical attacks are also boosted, and he is able to perform multiple Exceed Charges in quick succession.

Faiz transforms into Axel Form from his default form by wearing the Faiz Axel and swapping its Axel Mission Memory with the Faiz Driver's Faiz Mission Memory. When this is performed, the Full Metal Lung chest plates will open to reveal the Faiz Core in the center of Faiz's chest. The Photon Streams then turn silver and the Ultimate Finder turns red.

Axel Form Components:

HEAD:

Black Shell Met: The black helmet base of Faiz. It is a reinforced helmet developed by Smart Brain that is made of a thin, hard shell made of Sol-Metal, a rare supermetal with a hardness similar to diamond, layered in multiple layers and is equipped with an anti-shock absorption bag inside to protect the wearer's head from serious head injuries.

Extreme regulator: The metallic mouthpiece, with a wide triangular piece at the centre that points up slightly to resemble the sharp tooth of a shark. it is built in with an oxygen supply device inside, which enables the wearer to perform activities in harsh environments with extremely low oxygen levels, such as underwater, high in the sky, or places with toxic gas.

Satellite Signal: The green light that is close to the forehead of the helmet. It mainly flashes when communicating with satellites and tracking enemies. The green gauge is stably supplied, flashing greens indicate access while accessing, flashing red indicates an access error, and lights up red when communication is not possible.

Ultimate Finder: The red visor, split in the middle by the Photon Stream of the helmet to make it look like the Greek Phi symbol. It has an ultra-sensitive camera that converts images into electrical signals and conveys them to he wearer. It also has a scope function that allows daylight vision even in the darkness, and an X-ray camera function that allows seeing through objects. At night (or in areas with low light), it glows red.

Photon Stream: The silver energy flow path for Photon Blood that goes along the bottom of the Black Shell Met and goes around the Ultimate Finder to form the Phi Symbol shape on the helmet.

Global feelers: The silver antennae that are connected to the Photon Stream on the head, which are between the Ultimate Finder, but is away from the Satellite Signal. They communicate with the artificial satellites Eagle Sat and Hawk Eye that support Kamen Rider Faiz's systems. They can collect information as well as download new programs.

Extreme nose: The small silver metal panel at the upper forehead of the helmet. It is an olfactory organ that artificially creates a sense of smell one million times more potent than that of humans. While its sensitivity can be freely adjusted, it typically has the same olfactory powers as a dog.

Photon Terminal: The slightly long silver panel that runs vertically down the helmet, which is between the Ultimate Finder.  It is a junction ballast that connects photon streams. The Photon Blood flowing within the three terminals emits too much energy, so this equipment applies resistance so that the suit itself does not self-destruct, and it supplies power to the whole body in a stable manner. There is another Photon Terminal located on the back.

Pin Falls Sonar: the extremely sensitive audio devices on each side of the helmet that can hear a needle fall from 5km away. The sensitivity can be freely changed according to the wearer's will. They look like a right-angle triangle with two thick lines below that indent into the Black Shell Met a little.

Metal Intercooler: The heat dissipation plate for releasing excess heat generated by Photon blood to the outside. In particular, electronic devices are concentrated in the head, so a large one is installed at the back of the head.

BODY:

Full Metal Lung: The silver coloured dual chestpieces at the front, split by the Photon Stream in the centre, made up of Sol-Metal, a supermetal with a hardness similar to diamond, developed by Smart Brain. It has a structure in which two shock-absorbing bags are sandwiched between four solid boards, and it can repel a tank's main gun. Heavy armour. It also has a built-in oxygen tank. When Faiz enters Axel Mode, they open up and slide upward (one to the left and the other to the right) to the middle, showing the inside of the Faiz Core at the centre

Power Fingers: The silver, round, cone-shaped fingertips at the end of the gloves, which are strong enough to break through a 30cm iron plate, and have a supple touch so the wearer can press the keys on the Faiz Phone (hence the round cone shape).

Silver Stream: The silver energy flowpaths for Photon Blood that run across the body. As the output of Photon Blood increases, the Photon Stream changes colour from clear red in normal form to silver. This is because Sol-glass, the main component of the photon stream, has deteriorated due to higher output, and is also a red flag that represents the durability limit of the photon stream. As a result, if the Silver Stream continues to exist for more than 35 seconds, it will self-destruct, and not only will the wearer be exposed to a large amount of photon blood and die, but the surrounding area will be contaminated with deteriorated photon blood 3km square. This is why it is advised to remove the Faiz Axel Mission Memory from the Faiz Phone to change back to normal mode after use.

Sol Foam: The black reinforced bodysuit, which is made of ultra-fine metal thread made of Sol-Metal 315, which combines hardness to protect the wearer with softness, so it is flexible enough for them to move. It has a reinforced surface of soft plastic and is coated with silver.

Flex bellows: The black bellows (air bag devices) on the lower legs are used for shock absorption if the wearer jumps or falls from a certain height.

Neck Shield: The black neck shield, which is made of ultra-fine metal thread made of Sol-Metal 315, which combines hardness to protect the wearer with softness, so it is flexible enough for it is able to move. There are countless capillary cables running inside it that protects the neck from external shocks. The cables also serve to transmit information between the suit and the Black Shell Met of the helmet.

Sol-Guard: The black shoulderpads, which is made of ultra-fine metal thread made of Sol-Metal 315, which combines hardness to protect the wearer with softness, so it is flexible enough for it is able to move. It has a Photon stream going across it, with rectangular Metal Intercoolers on the front, side and back.

Metal Intercooler: The heat dissipation plate for releasing excess heat generated by Photon blood to the outside. The ones on the body are connected to the Full Metal Lung and go to the back of the shoulders, while the others are on the Sol-Guard

Knee Folder: The silver knee guard, made of Sol-Metal 228, with a higher hardness of Sol-Metal. It consists of two metal boards and one shock absorber. While protecting your knees, it also serves as a powerful striking weapon. It also has the Photon Stream of the legs running over it.

Power Anklet: the silver control terminal to focus power on the legs when kicking. In addition, the bellows-shaped flex bellows surrounding the calf absorb the intense impact of a kick or falling from great heights.

Energy Holster: An energy amplification terminal mount mechanism to set the Faiz pointer when firing the "Crimson Smash" finisher. It is located on the lower right leg.

Spin Pad: The black protective pads that protect the spine and central Photon Stream. It works a bit like an airbag when the wearer falls and collides on their back.

Power Loading Board: A microcomputer unit that uses the same smart PCIV as the Faiz driver for its CPU. Equipped with a program optimized for controlling Axel Form, it controls Bloody Core and activates Faiz Accel Form.

Lung Connector: A rotating shaft that connects the body to the full metal lung below the full metal lung. The interior serves as a route for exhausting excess energy and residual heat.

Bloody Core: A forced reaction amplification reactor that amplifies photon blood generated by a fuse screwdriver and sends it throughout the body through a silver stream. In order to secure the energy necessary for Axel Form, it also plays the role of temporarily storing a large amount of Photon Blood.

Coolant Breather: A cooling pipe that cools the computer and prevents thermal runaway. High-performance cooling liquid flows through the pipe at high speed and is directly connected to the smart PC TYPE AXEL case.

Drive initializer: Stable control mechanism to prevent the fuse driver from being destroyed. This feature keeps the colour of the photon stream clear red instead of silver only near the Faiz Driver.

6.content:
Rider Form: Blaster Form

Form belongs to: Faiz

By inserting the Faiz Phone into the Faiz Blaster briefcase and entering the transformation code again, Faiz can access Blaster Form („Éñ„É©„Çπ„Çø„Éº„Éï„Ç©„Éº„É†, BurastƒÅ F≈çmu), the most powerful form of the Faiz Gear. The amount of Photon Blood that the Faiz Gear produces increases to the extreme where it overflows from the Photon Streams and spreads itself over the Sol Foam and the Sol Metal, changing their color to red. Faiz also receives a new, more powerful, set of Full Metal Lung with a backpack like device attached to it called Photon Field Floater („Éï„Ç©„Éà„É≥„Éï„Ç£„Éº„É´„Éâ„Éï„É≠„Éº„Çø„Éº, Foton Fƒ´rudo Fur≈çtƒÅ) that releases constant waves of Photon energy to give Faiz Blaster flying capacities. By focusing the release pattern however, the thrusters of the Photon Field Floater can be used as powerful energy cannons called the Bloody Cannons („Éñ„É©„ÉÉ„Éá„Ç£„Éª„Ç≠„É£„Éé„É≥, Buraddi Kyanon). Faiz's signature Crimson Smash attack has been powered up significantly. The Blaster Crimson Smash is so tremendously powerful that damaging Photon Energy waves radiate from the point of impact and destroy everything around it.

All of these new abilities and more, except for his Crimson Smash kick which can be performed without the Faiz Pointer, are accessed by inputting codes into the Faiz Blaster, which also holds the Faiz Phone and can transform into Blaster and Blade modes for the Photon Blaster and Photon Breaker Exceed Charges.

Blaster Form Components:

HEAD:

Crimson Shell Met: The red helmet base of Faiz's Blaster Form. It is a reinforced helmet developed by Smart Brain that is made of a thin, hard shell made of Sol-Metal, a rare supermetal with a hardness similar to diamond, layered in multiple layers and is equipped with an anti-shock absorption bag inside to protect the wearer's head from serious head injuries.

Extreme regulator: The metallic mouthpiece, with a wide triangular piece at the centre that points up slightly to resemble the sharp tooth of a shark. it is built in with an oxygen supply device inside, which enables the wearer to perform activities in harsh environments with extremely low oxygen levels, such as underwater, high in the sky, or places with toxic gas.

Satellite Signal: The green light that is close to the forehead of the helmet. It mainly flashes when communicating with satellites and tracking enemies. The green gauge is stably supplied, flashing greens indicate access while accessing, flashing red indicates an access error, and lights up red when communication is not possible.

Ultimate Finder V2: The yellowish-orange visor, split in the middle by the Photon Stream of the helmet to make it look like the Greek Phi symbol. It has a super X-ray scope function that allows it to see through lead plates several tens of meters thick, a macroscope function that allows it to visually see the molecular structure of the target, and a superstar light scope function that ensures vision even in complete darkness.

Blackout Stream: The Photon stream discolored black by a self-defense program. The black photon stream completely blocks the flow of photon blood energy, preventing backflow and runaway and self-destruction of the suit.

Global feelers: The red antennae that are connected to the Photon Stream on the head, which are between the Ultimate Finder, but are away from the Satellite Signal. They communicate with the artificial satellites Eagle Sat and Hawk Eye that support Kamen Rider Faiz's systems. They can collect information as well as download new programs.

Extreme nose: The small silver metal panel at the upper forehead of the helmet. It is an olfactory organ that artificially creates a sense of smell one million times more potent than that of humans. While its sensitivity can be freely adjusted, it typically has the same olfactory powers as a dog.

Photon Terminal: The slightly long silver panel that runs vertically down the helmet, which is between the Ultimate Finder.  It is a junction ballast that connects photon streams. The Photon Blood flowing within the three terminals emits too much energy, so this equipment applies resistance so that the suit itself does not self-destruct, and it supplies power to the whole body in a stable manner. There is another Photon Terminal located on the back.

Ultimate Sonar: You can even hear the sound of a needle falling 30km away. It has the same function as the Pin Drop Sonar, but its performance is several steps higher.

Metal Intercooler: The heat dissipation plate for releasing excess heat generated by Photon blood to the outside. In particular, electronic devices are concentrated in the head, so a large one is installed at the back of the head.

BODY:

Absolute Lung: The silver Breast shield with three times the strength of the full metal lung. In theory, it blocks ultra-high heat comparable to the surface temperature of the sun, and can operate even at depths of 2,500 meters. In the centre is a cardiopulmonary assist stabiliser and a vital stabiliser. The blackout stream on the Absolute Lung makes a U-shape, with a singular line going up.

Shoulder Shield: The shoulder armour made of absolute metal that is stronger than Sol-Metal, developed by Smart Brain. It can also be used as a powerful striking weapon when used to protect Faiz's shoulders and perform shoulder tackles.

Crimson cross: The red bodysuit, made out of Sol-Foam. The Sol-foam's metal fibres turn red due to photon blood running throughout its body. The suit itself has an energy comparable to Faiz Edge's medium mode, so if it's an average Orphnoch, it can be reduced to ashes just by touching it. The inside of the suit is coated with cooling fibre material and a coolant substance to protect the wearer.

Energy Holster: A holster that suppresses the increased power of Photon Blood and reliably supplies energy to the pointer. Made of absolute metal with strength greater than Sol-Metal developed by Smart Brain.

Photon Blood Circuit Holsterpart: A device for controlling increased Photon Blood without the Faiz Phone. In addition to the breast part on the chest, it is placed in the arm part of both arms, where energy is particularly concentrated, the holster part of both legs, and the back part of the backpack.

Photon muzzle: When releasing the special kick "Enhanced Crimson Smash", the outlet is used to release and diffuse concentrated photon blood all at once. It is 1.5 times stronger than diamond.

Shield Collar: A collar made of absolute metal that is stronger than sol metal developed by Smart Brain. It protects the wearer's neck from impact.

Photon Blood Circuit Breastpart: A device for controlling increased photon blood without a Faizphone. In addition to the breast part on the chest, it is placed in the arm part of both arms, where energy is particularly concentrated, the holster part of both legs, and the back part of the backpack.

Photon indicator: The stability of the photon blood at that time is displayed in colour via an indicator on the arm. Yellow is increasing, red is somewhat unstable, and flashing yellow and red indicates a danger zone.

Blackout Stream: Photon stream discoloured black by a self-defence program. The black photon stream completely blocks the flow of photon blood energy, preventing backflow and runaway and self-destruction of the suit.

Flexbellows: the red shock absorbers that protect the legs when kicking or falling from high altitude.

Final Anklet: Shock shock-absorbing absorber that protects the wearer's ankles and shins from the impact of kicks and falls.

Energy Holster: An energy amplification terminal mount mechanism to set the Faiz pointer when firing the "Crimson Smash" finisher. It is located on the lower right leg.

Photon Stabiliser: A resistor installed at a key point in the suit. It has the function of maintaining the flow rate of photon blood appropriately.

Photon field braking system: By deploying a photon field, it offsets the recoil when using the Bloody Cannon.

Photon Blood Circuit Backpart: A circuit for controlling the amount of photon blood flow in the backpack. This is a particularly important part for keeping the photon field floater under control.

Photon field floater: It generates a photon field, a special propellant than the four generators, and uses its injection power to fly through the air. Generators on both sides can be mounted on the shoulders to form a "Bloody Cannon".

7.content:
The Faiz Gear („Éï„Ç°„Ç§„Ç∫„ÇÆ„Ç¢, Faizu Gia) was the second set of Kamen Rider Gear developed by the Smart Brain Corporation to protect the Orphnoch King. The Faiz Gear had less power than the original Delta Gear, but had a much greater functionality. Like most of the Rider Gears that Smart Brain developed, the Faiz Gear can only be worn by Orphnochs or humans implanted with Orphnoch DNA.

Transforming into Kamen Rider Faiz burns Orphnoch DNA, so humans who have been implanted with this DNA will quickly run out and no longer be able to use the Faiz Gear. Humans with insufficient DNA are rejected by the Faiz Gear with the word 'error'. Orphnochs may use the Faiz Gear more often (in their human form only), but their DNA breaks down with continued use.

To prime the weapons (that being the Faiz Pointer, Faiz Shot and Faiz Edge), the Faiz mission memory has to be slid off the exterior of the Faiz Phone (with it still inside the Faiz Driver) and inserted it into the mission memory slot, causing it to announce "Ready!".

Faiz's equipment:

SB-555B Faiz Driver - Faiz's transformation belt.

SB-555P Faiz Phone - The control unit of the Faiz Gear.

Faiz Mission Memory - A small metallic card key containing the information of the Faiz Armor. It is located at the top of the Faiz Phone, and can be removed to power the Faiz Shot, Faiz Pointer and Faiz Edge.

SB-555C Faiz Shot - Digital camera-shaped knuckle-duster (despite its name, it doesn't actually shoot anything, as it is used for powerful punches)

SB-555L Faiz Pointer - A laser pointer which enables to produce an energy drill deathblow.

SB-555H Faiz Edge - A lightsaber-like sword that can be stored in Auto vajin's right handlebar as the accelerator.

SB-555W Faiz Axel - A stopwatch that enables to gain access to Axel Form once the Axel Mission Memory replaces the regular Mission Memory in the Faiz Phone.

Axel Mission Memory - A small metallic card key containing the information of the Faiz Axel Armor. When inserted into the Faiz Phone, it changes Faiz into their Axel Form

SB-555T Faiz Blaster - A large modern Trunk Trunkbox-shaped laser cannon/sword that enables to gain access to Blaster Form.

SB-555V Auto Vajin - Faiz's motorcycle that can transform in a robot-like Battle Mode.

SB-VX0 Jetsliger - A heavily-armed combat motorcycle.

---

Faiz Gear briefcase: A small black suitcase, with silver outlines and the silver Smart Brain Logo. It can hold the Faiz Driver (with the back of the belt folded up), the Faiz Phone, the Faiz Pointer and the Faiz Shot.

8.content:
The Mobile Phone-type Multi-device SB-555P Faiz Phone is a cellphone-like device that is in reality the control unit of the Faiz Gear, the primary storage place for a Mission Memory as a transgenerator that powers the Faiz Gear or the Faiz Axel Form by dialling the activation code.

When the phone is transformed into Phone Blaster Mode , forming the Variable Light Bullet Gun Phone Blaster (ÂèØÂ§âÂºèÂÖâÂºæÈäÉ „Éï„Ç©„É≥„Éñ„É©„Çπ„Çø„Éº, Kahen-shiki Hikaridama J≈´ Fon BurasutƒÅ), it can be used for long-range attacks. It can be combined with the Faiz Pointer to boost its abilities.

When a function is activated (via inputting an input code and pressing enter or just pressing enter), the Faiz Phone will announce the function (Example: 1-0-6 + ENTER = "Burst Mode!") in a synthetic male voice with a Japanese Accent.

When the Faiz Phone is in "Standby Mode", it'll emit a middle-pitched charging hum, and when it is inserted into the Faiz Driver, it'll say "Complete!".

Faiz Phone's Components:

Muzzle Antenna: The phone's ultra-sensitive antenna. It uses Smart Brain's terminal for communication purposes. Any communications can be encrypted and scrambled to prevent interception. In Phone Blaster Mode, it serves as the muzzle, and can shoot out energy bullets and photon bullets thanks to the Electromagnetic Rifling (ÈõªÁ£Å„É©„Ç§„Éï„É™„É≥„Ç∞, Denji Raifuringu) engraved inside.

Micro Speaker: A microphone located between the screen and the Monitoring Window. Allows for uninterrupted conversations even if the user is underground.
Monitoring Window („É¢„Éã„Çø„É™„É≥„Ç∞„Ç¶„Ç§„É≥„Éâ„Ç¶, Monitaringu Uindou) - The screen. In addition to displaying the currently activated function, the user can visually check other status such as battery level, text messages and emails.

Metal Case: The gray metal casing. It is made out of Sol Metal 228 („ÇΩ„É´„É°„Çø„É´228, Soru Metaru 228), a supermetal developed by Smart Brain that has hardness close to diamond, and has a higher hardness than normal Sol Metal (the metal that Faiz's armor is made of). It boasts high rigidity.

Second Case: The black parts. It is made out of Silver Rubber („Ç∑„É´„É¥„Çß„Éº„É´„É©„Éê„Éº, Shiruvu~ƒìru RabƒÅ), making it extremely easy to hold. It does not deteriorate.

Trigger: The trigger. In Phone Mode, it is locked. In Phone Blaster Mode, it is pressed to fire photon bullets.

Trans Bridge: The circular axis that allows the Faiz Phone to change between Phone and Phone Blaster Modes.

Site Attach Rail: A special attachment rail that is revealed when the Faiz Phone is switched to Phone Blaster Mode. It has a cable and a connection harness for exchanging data inside. When the Phone blaster Mode is equipped with the Faiz Pointer, it can use the Faiz Pointer's laser pointer lock on to targets up to 2000m away.

Numeric Keypad: The keypad. It serves to input codes and phone numbers, and can also be sued as a simple keyboard for text messaging. (Note: 'tenkƒ´' („ÉÜ„É≥„Ç≠„Éº) is a common Japanese abbreviation for 'ten keypad' („ÉÜ„É≥„Ç≠„Éº„Éë„ÉÉ„Éâ), a term used in Japan for 'numeric keyboard'.)

ENTER Key: The 'ENTER' button. Used to determine a command code.

Microphone: A highly sensitive microphone located below the Numeric Keypad. Used within Call Mode to speak.

Faiz Mission Memory: A metallic card key attached to the Faiz Phone's exterior. It can be taken off and slotted onto other equipment that belongs to Faiz.

Condition Signal („Ç≥„É≥„Éá„Ç£„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Ç∑„Ç∞„Éä„É´, Kondishon Shigunaru) - A flashing light attached to the Mission Memory. It flashes red when the Faiz Phone is low on battery, blinks slowly during a call and flashes green irregularly when downloading data.

Smart Battery („Çπ„Éû„Éº„Éà„Éê„ÉÉ„ÉÜ„É™„Éº, SumƒÅto Batterƒ´) - A small, large-capacity storage battery created by Smart Brain. It is a few centimeters large, and can store energy for 480 hours in Standby mode and 240 hours in normal use. Additionally, it can be recharged simply by placing it in the Faiz Driver.

---

Key Codes: 

5-5-5 Enter (Standing By): This code switches the Faiz Phone and Faiz Driver into transformation standby mode. From here, inserting the Faiz Phone into the Driver will complete the transformation, allowing for the user to become Faiz unless they are a normal person. If a normal person attempts to transform, the phone will register an error, announce "ERROR", and violently eject from the user along with the belt.

1-0-3 Enter (Single Mode): This code allows for Faiz to convert the Faiz Phone into the Phone Blaster and fire a continuous beam of Photon Energy for about 3 seconds. It has 12 shots until it must be recharged.

1-0-6 Enter (Burst Mode): This code allows for Faiz to convert the Faiz Phone into the Phone Blaster and fire 3 round bursts of Photon Energy. It has 4 bursts until it must be recharged.

2-7-9 Enter (Charge): This code allows for Faiz to give the Phone Blaster a five-second recharge, reloading the photon magazine.

5-8-2-1 Enter (Auto Vajin, come closer): This code allows for Faiz to summon the Auto Vajin. Unused.

5-8-2-6 Enter (Auto Vajin Battle Mode): This code allows for the Auto Vajin to transform into its humanoid robot form. Unused.

5-8-8-6 Enter (Auto Vajin Vehicle Mode): This code allows for the Auto Vajin to transform into its motorcycle form.

5-8-1-4 Enter (Auto Vajin, get into the action): This code allows for the Auto Vajin to attack one or more targets autonomously while in Battle Mode.

5-8-4-6 Enter (Auto vajin take off): This code allows for the Auto Vajin to fly while in Battle Mode.

3-8-2-1 Enter (Jetsliger, come closer): This code allows Faiz to summon the Jetsliger.

3-8-1-4 Enter (Jetsliger, get into the action): This code allows for the Jetsliger to attack one or more targets autonomously. Unused.

3-8-4-6 Enter (Jetsliger, take off): This code allows for the Jetsliger to hover above the ground in order to clear a large obstacle, traverse uneven terrain, or maneuver more nimbly during battle.

ENTER: Pressing the "Enter" button without entering a code allows for Faiz to execute an "Exceed Charge" depending on the item he inserted the Mission Memory into, sending a burst of power from the Faiz Driver along the Photon Streams to the weapon in question, giving it a tremendous power boost, and in some cases extra abilities.

End Call: Pressing the "End Call" button will switch off the Faiz Driver and cause the Sol Foam and Sol Metal to disappear, causing the user to detransform.

9.content:
The Faiz Driver was designed for specific compatibility with the Faiz Phone, generating the Photon Stream („Éï„Ç©„Éà„É≥„Çπ„Éà„É™„Éº„É†, Foton Sutorƒ´mu) that forms the Faiz Armour when the Mission Memory is installed into the phone. Under normal circumstances, the belt is usually kept inside a briefcase along with the Faiz Pointer and the Faiz Shot, and is assembled by placing the latter two devices into the Side Buckle („Çµ„Ç§„Éâ„Éê„ÉÉ„ÇØ„É´, Saido Bakkuru) holders on both sides of the belt. If the user presses End Call on the Faiz Phone or if the belt was somehow forcibly detached from the user, the armour dissolves.

Among the three Rider Gears, the Faiz Gear was the most balanced and the least taxing. Though it was weaker than the other gears, it was the fastest and had access to various gadgets (the Faiz Phone, Faiz Shot, Faiz Pointer and the Faiz Edge plus the help of the Auto Vajin) to suit any situation, and various forms (Axel Form, Blaster Form) that increased its power exponentially when fighting against powerful foes. Its biggest positive among the Gears in the series is that it has the least negative side effects. The Kaixa Gear immediately drains nearly all of the users' Orphnoch DNA after one use unless he or she has a substantial amount, while the Delta Gear has the possibility of making people addicted to battle. The Faiz Gear only drains Orphnoch DNA at a normal rate and has no other mental side effects.

User Restriction:
Faiz Driver can only be used by anyone with a great amount of Orphnoch DNA; otherwise, the driver will eject itself instead of letting the user transform.

To transform into Faiz, the wearer has to type in the code 5-5-5 and press the ENTER key on the Faiz Phone, causing it to announce "Standing By!" causing it to let out a medium-pitched charging sound. Once the Faiz Phone is inserted into the Faiz Driver's Trans Folder and turned 90 degrees to the left, the Faiz Phone will announce "Complete!" and then, the Photon Blood is emitted from the Photon Blood emitters, slowly going across the wearer's body (two on each side, going up and down), two going down the front of the legs and end at the feet, while the other two go up the front to combine at the chest and then split off again to each of the arms, and end at the handpads on the back of the hands. Once they have formed, they'll glow bright red, harden to form the Photon Streams of the body (with some tiny Photon Blood particles flying off sometimes) and form the Faiz armour onto the wearer's body. 

When the wearer presses the End Call key on the Faiz Phone or the Faiz Driver has been forcefully detached from the wearer's waist, the Photon Streams of the Faiz Armour will glow bright red, almost instantly dissolving the Faiz Armour off the wearer's body and then, the Photon Stream turns back into Photon Blood and retracts back into the Photon Blood Emitters.

Faiz Driver's Components:

Faiz Gear Cradle („Éï„Ç°„Ç§„Ç∫„ÇÆ„Ç¢„Éª„ÇØ„É¨„Éº„Éâ„É´, Faizu Gia Kurƒìdoru): A pedestal in which the Faiz Pointer is stored. On its surface is a bonding terminal that charges the Faiz Pointer with Photon Blood sent from the Faiz Driver. The Faiz Gear Cradle is stored on Faiz's right side.

Intercooler („Ç§„É≥„Çø„Éº„ÇØ„Éº„É©„Éº, IntƒÅk≈´rƒÅ): A small red vent located near the upper right side of the Faiz Phone. It is a built-in cooling function that prevents the overheating of the Faiz Driver's HDD and CPU.

Photon Blood Emitters: The two cylindrical exhausts on the front of the Faiz Driver. When transforming or using the Exceed Charge function, they'll emit Photon Blood.

Trans Folder („Éà„É©„É≥„Çπ„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„Éº, Toransu ForudƒÅ): The cradle where the Faiz Phone is stored. To transform, the Faiz Phone is inserted into the Trans Folder and then tilted 90 degrees to the left. The synchronisation system allows the user to unlock the lock.

Phone Connector („Éï„Ç©„É≥„Ç≥„Éç„ÇØ„Çø, Fon Konekuta): The Trans Folder's connection terminal that allows the Faiz Phone to be inserted. In addition to charging the Faiz Phone with energy, it exchanges data with it. It is made out of titanium.

Lock Pin („É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Éî„É≥, Rokku Pin): A titanium pin that is used to lock the Faiz Phone into the Trans Folder.

Forced Release Switch (Âº∑Âà∂„É™„É™„Éº„Çπ„Çπ„Ç§„ÉÉ„ÉÅ, Ky≈çsei Rirƒ´su Suitchi): A special switch located on the Driver's upper left side corner. By pressing a special magnet key against it, it becomes possible to remove the Faiz Phone and HDD without the wearer.

SBV-HDD„ÄàPD„Äâ10TB (SBV-HDD„ÄàPD„Äâ10TB): A special device located on the Driver's left side, black section on the belt strap. It records Faiz's combat data in a large-capacity HDD of 10 terabytes. Covered in a Sol Metal 228 housing, it is theoretically equipped with a shock-resistant mechanism that will not damage or lose data even if it receives a shock comparable to an atomic bomb. It is removable.

SBV-HDD„ÄàPD„Äâ8TB (SBV-HDD„ÄàPD„Äâ8TB): A special device located on the Driver's right side, black section on the belt strap. It is an 8-terabyte large capacity HDD. It is covered with a robust housing made of Sol Metal 228 („ÇΩ„É´„É°„Çø„É´228, Soru Metaru 228), which is a super metal developed by Smart Brain that has a hardness close to that of diamond, and has a higher hardness than regular Sol Metal. It contains system-related data, including the Kamen Rider Faiz startup program.

Smart PC IV („Çπ„Éû„Éº„ÉàPC ‚Ö£, SumƒÅto PC ‚Ö£): An internally concealed unit; it is the core of the Faiz Driver and it incorporates an ultra-compact next-generation high-speed CPU made by Smart Brain. It boasts a computing speed that is comparable to that of a defence ministry supercomputer.

10.content:
The Digital Torchlight & Pointing Marker Device SB-555L Faiz Pointer („Éá„Ç∏„Çø„É´„Éà„Éº„ÉÅ„É©„Ç§„ÉàÔºÜ„Éù„Ç§„É≥„ÉÜ„Ç£„É≥„Ç∞„Éû„Éº„Ç´„Éº„Éá„Éê„Ç§„Çπ Ôº≥Ôº¢ÔºçÔºïÔºïÔºïÔº¨ „Éï„Ç°„Ç§„Ç∫„Éù„Ç§„É≥„Çø„Éº, Dejitaru T≈çchiraito & Pointingu MƒÅkƒÅ Debaisu SB-555L Faizu PointƒÅ) was developed by Smart Brain as a means to protect the Orphnoch King, to which it is disguised to resemble a flashlight. It has Digital Torchlight Mode and Kick Mode.

The Faiz Pointer was designed for specific compatibility with Kamen Rider Faiz's Mission Memory, attached to either Power Anklet for Faiz to execute the Crimson Smash finisher, producing an energy drill around his foot while executing the deathblow.

While in Axel Form, the Exceed Charge attack is enhanced into the Axel Crimson Smash, allowing Faiz to either shoot multiple energy drills at one enemy or shoot individual ones to multiple enemies.

The Faiz Pointer can also be combined with the Faiz Phone in Phone Blaster Mode to extend the range of the Phone Blaster's shots. 

Faiz Pointer components:

Sol-tech lens: A lens that irradiates light emitted from an internal light source as a stable linear beam of light. Automatically tracks target objects using a laser point marker light. It is possible to catch opponents up to 2000m away.

Point cylinder: It has a built-in pointing marker light irradiation device when used as a torchlight.

Balance alert: Photon Blood stable supply warning light. It flashes green during normal times and red during abnormal times.

Metal end cap: The heat sink. It is equipped with an internal cooling fan that dissipates excess energy generated in kick mode from the slit hole and prevents the electronic equipment from running out of heat.

Attach Point: Normally, it is set on the right hip of the Faiz driver, but when used in "kick mode", when attached to Faiz's Energy Holster on their right leg, it becomes a joint for supplying Photon Blood and is also used as an energy harness.

Cylinder: The part that adjusts the irradiation range when using torchlight. If you turn it to the right, you can add a supplement, and if you turn it to the left, you can adjust it to a wide range of irradiation ports.

Extension Cylinder: When "kick mode" is activated, it stretches and adjusts its focus with three internal lenses to reliably irradiate the point marker light.

1.content: A very kind and welcoming kingdom in the sky that is a land of freedom, peace, fairness, and harmony. The kingdom has a tragic history, but in recent times, everything is doing okay.

2.content: An academy that's open for everyone with a pure heart and the will to help others, unconditionally and unreservedly. Most of the Cookies go there to learn magic.

3.content: Denizens of the Vanilla Kingdom.

4.content: Black Raisin Cookie's Village was a settlement located on the grounds below the suspended Vanilla Kingdom; the residents from this village aided in helping Pure Vanilla Cookie and the Vanilla Kingdom get back on its feet. Currently, it is likely dissolved and its citizens now live and work in the Vanilla Kingdom's central establishments surrounding the castle.

5.content:
An extremely kind and caring cookie humanoid. Housing the other half of Shadow Milk Cookie's soul jam, he eventually fell subject to Shadow Milk Cookie and became Truthless Recluse, a sad husk of Pure Vanilla Cookie's former self, destined to become a powerful ruler of deceit, just like Shadow Milk Cookie. Fortunately for Pure Vanilla Cookie, he was able to trick Shadow Milk Cookie, which lead to his awakening, allowing Pure Vanilla Cookie to break away from Shadow Milk Cookie's clutches and becoming even more powerful than before. He has very powerful healing powers.

Pure Vanilla Cookie goes by he/him pronouns.

6.content:
A bratty, self-centered child cookie humanoid who is extremely intelligent, being responsible for making the Wafflebots that guard the Vanilla Kingdom. Despite how annoying and bratty they are on the outside, they are a genuinely good Cookie who wants to help. They used to be an enemy to the Vanilla Kingdom for a short while, but now they're a Vanillian who helps with the technology and security of the kingdom.

Strawberry Crepe Cookie uses they/them pronouns.

7.content:
A cookie humanoid who seems very distrustful and hostile at first, but once you get to know her, She's one of the most caring Cookies ever, being very protective and gentle to the Cookies she cares about. She used live with a few other cookies and a very small and scarce village, but once she met Pure Vanilla Cookie and helped bring back the Vanilla Kingdom, she and her fellow Villager Cookies have become residents of the Vanilla Kingdom. She helps defend the kingdom from any attackers, using the many crows she befriended to her aid.

Black Raisin Cookie uses she/her pronouns.

8.content: Five cookie humanoids who used to live in Black Raisin Cookie's Village, depending on her for survival. They now live good lives as Vanillians in the Vanilla Kingdom

9.content: Robots made out of ice cream items. The Wafflebots were made by Strawberry Crepe Cookie to protect them and the Vanilla Kingdom.

10.content: A war brought upon by Dark Enchantress Cookie that took the lives of many Vanillians in the past and destroyed the Vanilla Kingdom. In recent times, the Vanilla Kingdom has been rebuilt, but it has never been the same.
